name: Clad in Iron: Philippines 1898 - Manila Bay 1898
description: Additional historical scenario about the naval Battle of Manila Bay for the game Clad in Iron: Philippines 1898.

name: Aircraft War: Extra Level Pack 1
description: More levels and more fighter jets have been added to the game with this dlc pack. Choose your plane and get ready for battle. You can also play co-op with your friend.

name: Aircraft War: Shape Wars
description: Aircraft war now continues its adventure with shape wars. Fight the shapes with this new DLC package. New maps and new characters have been added to the game. Have fun.

name: Aircraft War: Tank Wars
description: Distinguished aircraft war followers, now the tanks are involved in the battle, choose your tank and start the war immediately. With this dlc package, 6 player tanks and 5 enemy tanks have been added to the game. Have fun.

name: Aircraft War: Dragon Wars
description: New DLC for Aircraft War. The war continues with all the excitement. Now dragons are involved in the war. You can also play two players from the same computer with the latest update. There is also co-op and versus option in the game.

name: Aircraft War: Car Wars
description: Aircraft War, now with Car Wars continue to have fun. The game adds more excitement to you with 5 different maps with different player cars and enemy cars. You can also play co-op on the same computer screen as your friend. Or, you can choose versus and try to shoot each other with your friend.

name: Mystic Vale: Vale of Magic
description: Mystic Vale: Vale of Magic introduces 54 new advancement cards and 18 vale cards to the Mystic Vale base game, expanding players' options and opening up new crafting combinations.

name: Mystic Vale: Mana Storm
description: The campaign to restore Gaia’s realm continues as other druids and creatures join the ranks. With the extra resources, will the cursed land finally be cured? Discover 48 new Advancement Cards, 18 Vale Cards, 8 Leaders and for the first-time amulets in a bid to win the fight.

name: Mystic Vale: Vale of the Wild
description: The Vale of the Wild expansion introduces two new mechanics to Mystic Vale, making your cards even stronger and opening up a whole new realm of combo possibilities! Pick your druidic leader and head into battle, the Valley of Life depends on you!

name: Revhead: Turbo
description: Turbo Pack DLC contains more than 60 new components, which gives high performance customisation to the game. It introduces twin turbo setups, intercoolers and additional air intakes to gain more horse power. Contents of this DLC allows the player to build cars with over 2000 horsepower!

name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2: Chara Pack 3
description: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Yukari Yakumo, Eirin Yagokoro, Yasaka Kanako, Junko and Kazami Yuka. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.

name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2: Chara Pack 4
description: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Ibuki Suika, Ibaraki Kasen, Shikieiki, Hinanawi Tenshi and Hata no Kokoro. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.

name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2: Chara Pack 2
description: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Flandre Scarlet, Komeji Koishi, Aki Minoriko, Tsukumo Yatsuhashi and Yorigami Jyoon. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.

name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2: Chara Pack 1
description: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Remilia Scarlet, Komeji Satori, Aki Sizuha, Tsukumo Benben and Yorigami Shion. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.

name: Crazy Sapper 3D: Classic Mode
description: This package adds new game mode "Classic", in which Sapper do not need to pass through all minefield, but the goal is to open all mined on the field. Airplane transports Sapper to any available spot on the minefield, and if player will win the level in bonus time - it will increase level scores.

name: Nowhere
description: Nowhere is a horror action game for mobile phones. The game takes place in two worlds where players control Lucas and John. Lucas has lost his wife Emily and is slowly getting his life together with Catherine, while John goes out to find his wife Emily while battling monsters.

name: Ants
description: In this family-friendly 2-d puzzle game, you'll place arrows and tunnels to help guide the ants to their new anthills, avoiding obstacles such as rocks, water, ant traps, and spiders. Over 240 levels range from easy to mind-bendingly difficult.

name: Worlds Series Battle Grand Master Endgame
description: Unleash on other players in battle royale mode where its every man for themselves. Get to the guns and health first to outwit your opponents in this small world until you remain the victor by most kills. Loot. Kill. Survive.

name: Dead Effect 2 VR: Escape From Meridian
description: Escape from Meridian DLC is a story expansion adding a new story arc with 10 story missions filled with new enemies, new features and some surprises.

name: Dead Effect 2: Escape From Meridian
description: Escape from Meridian DLC is a story expansion adding a new story arc with 10 story missions filled with new enemies, new features and some surprises.

name: Dead Effect 2 VR: Cybermagic
description: CyberMagic DLC unlocks fourth playable character Xandria and adds a lot of new combat abilities for other characters too.

name: Dark and Light: Shard of Faith
description: Users will need to own the base game, Dark and Light in Steam library, to run the DLC.

name: Generation Zero: Apparel Crafting
description: It’s time to turn your ultimate 80s outfits into battle worthy garments with the addition of the Apparel Crafting in this latest update. By exploring and scavenging in Östertörn and Himfjäll, you will be able to find crafting materials or objects you can strip down for parts. Use these resources to enhance your clothing, making them as strong as they are fashionable.

name: Of Guards and Thieves: Racing
description: Of Guards and Thieves: Racing includes a new Free to Play Racing game mode with three unique vehicles, new classes, skins and 6 new official racing maps. Plus Map Editor support for Racing mode and tons of new map editor tiles that will allow you to build your racing circuits!

name: Of Guards and Thieves: Hunting Grounds
description: Of Guards and Thieves: Hunting Grounds includes a 2 new classes, Sniper for Guards faction and Hunter for Thieves faction, four new weapons, four new gadgets, one new official map called River Village, 10 new unlockable levels and more than 700 new jungle-themed map editor unique objects.

name: Insights: Maniac Vortex
description: An old school point and click adventure game in a nostalgic pixelart look. Young journalist Thomas wants to write a newspaper article about the psychatric asylum in the small town Fuchsberg. Not knowing yet that he will be going on a great adventure leading to the greatest article of his life.

name: BattleRush: Imperial Japanese Army
description: The Imperial Japanese Army (IJA; 大日本帝國陸軍 Dai-Nippon Teikoku Rikugun; "Army of the Greater Japanese Empire") was the official ground-based armed force of the Empire of Japan from 1868 to 1945.

name: BattleRush: German AT Infantry
description: Anti-tank warfare arose as a result of the need to develop technology and tactics to destroy tanks during World War I. Since the first tanks were developed by the Triple Entente in 1916 but not operated in battle until 1917, the first anti-tank weapons were developed by the German Empire.

name: BattleRush: German Special Forces
description: German Special Forces

name: BattleRush: US Special Forces
description: US Special Forces

name: BattleRush: Heavy Tanks
description: Tiger was a German heavy tank of World War II deployed from 1942 in Africa and Europe usually in independent heavy tank battalions. The M26 Pershing was a heavy tank/medium tank of the United States Army. The IS Tank was a series of heavy tanks developed as a successor to the KV-series by the Soviet Union during World War II.

name: BattleRush: US Marine Corps
description: US Marine Corps

name: BattleRush: USSR Army
description: The Workers' and Peasants' Red Army (RKKA), was the army and the air force of the Russian Soviet Federative Socialist Republic, and, after 1922, the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics. The army was established immediately after the 1917 October Revolution (Red October or Bolshevik Revolution).

name: BattleRush: US AT Infantry
description: Anti-tank warfare arose as a result of the need to develop technology and tactics to destroy tanks during World War I. Since the first tanks were developed by the Triple Entente in 1916 but not operated in battle until 1917, the first anti-tank weapons were developed by the German Empire. This antitank DLC include a two new heroes.

name: BattleRush: German Snipers
description: German Elite Snipers

name: Tron Run/r: Outlands
description: Take your game beyond the Grid with a massive Outlands Pack featuring 16 new levels, 20 STREAM track elements, 5 new characters, and 3 new cycles.

name: Tron Run/r: Cycle Extender Bundle
description: Rev up your game with a turbocharged bundle featuring 9 new Cycle mode levels, 4 new STREAM tracks, 4 new characters, and 3 new cycles.

name: B.D.K
description: B.D.K is a short experimental first person horror game that mainly relies on atmosphere and sounds to create a creepy experience.

name: Market Dominion: Global Rivalry
description: The Cold War quietly rages on around the world as tensions rise between states. During these turbulent times, you are tasked as the CEO of a new, enterprising company. Can you overcome obstacles to become a burgeoning company and dominate the market?But can you overcome obstacles when it's Global Rivalry?

name: Market Dominion: Last Penny
description: The year is 1960. Different companies within different industries will reach out for the world's market domination. With fast growing worldwide connection and globalization, a lot of businesses will fight and sacrifice everything, to create a monopoly with them in the center. Can you overcome obstacles to become... the last man standing in the big monopoly you will create?

name: Presence
description: Plunge into the world of the bloody tragedy that took place at the boarding school and feel the fear and someone's frightening presence.

name: Ideology in Friction: Append
description: Following up from the critically acclaimed Dark Fantasy RPG, this DLC features 81 New Event CGs, alterations to existing story events, and an entirely new chapter revolving around Sachiyo - the strongest of the Viktor Knights and Zepp's mentor.

name: Rover Mechanic Simulator: Perseverance Rover
description: The Rover Mechanic Simulator: Perseverance Rover DLC lets you fix and learn everything you need to know about the new Mars rover!

name: Wanba Warriors: Character Pack 1
description: This pack includes 6 new playable characters. They are: Ian Yan Ma Jonn Chow Yiiiii Wheel Basket

name: Wanba Warriors: Character Pack 3
description: This pack includes 6 new playable characters. They are: Monkie Shifu Bowlie Chivalry Greatos Jr. Eye Boogie

name: Wanba Warriors: Character Pack 2
description: This pack includes 6 new playable characters. They are: M-Fish, Mad Ding, Devil Ding, Ghost, Radish and Foot.

name: Doom
description: All Hell's Breaking Loose! This is it! The gaming addiction that's been played by an estimated 10 million fanatics on the PC. And now it's out in a sweat-soaked, pulse-pounding, adrenaline-wrenching version for the PlayStation game console. It's Doom. The Custom PlayStation Edition. Enhanced to take full advantage of the PlayStation's cutting-edge technology. With over 50 levels of madness and mayhem from Ultimate Doom and Doom II. Plus unique, new levels of destruction that make all hell break loose on your screen!

name: Enchanted Kingdom: Descent of the Elders - Collector's Edition
description: Play puzzles and brain teasers in one of the best new mystery seek and find hidden object games free! In this one of the top easy search and find object finding games your goal is to find hidden objects needed to become a hero!

name: Equilibrium
description: Equilibrium combines god-game, resource management, and planetary simulation. Minimise atmospheric pollutants, and keep global temperatures hospitable for human life. Or let dirty industry run rampant and produce a blazing hot tomb world. We're not your boss, it's up to you.

name: Tyto Ecology: Cretaceous Mongolia
description: A dinosaur biodome is here, with the Cretaceous Mongolia! Explore an ecosystem from 70 million years ago as you place velociraptor, therizinosaurus, tarbosaurus, and more!

name: Tyto Ecology: Alaskan Tundra Ecosystem
description: The Alaskan tundra comes with 23 new species of producers, consumers, and decomposers for our first arctic biodome. Polar bears, caribou, arctic hares, and more!

name: Tyto Ecology: Himalayas Ecosystem
description: Red pandas, tigers, and bears, oh my! This DLC packs many amazing species in the Himalayas ecosystem for a brand new biodome. $1 from each purchase will be donated to the World Wildlife Fund.

name: One Night with Clara
description: A simple NSFW visual novel game. It's full 3D real-time rendering.

name: Search Party: Director's Cut
description: Claire's 8-year-old brother is missing. While looking for him during a search party, she finds herself completely lost and alone in the woods. She eventually spots a strange house in the distance... could Daniel be inside?

name: Space Bar at the End of the Galaxy
description: Space Bar at the End of the Galaxy is a Heist Comedy Space Opera Visual Novel where you play as Captain Leo Mancini, a tenacious and charming Space Pirate always looking for the next big heist.

name: Dream Golf VR: Jungle Temple
description: With this expansion, you can play an all new 18 hole mini golf course! Jungle Temple will have you exploring a series of mysterious megalithic structures in the middle of the jungle!

name: Dream Golf VR: Lighthouse Island
description: With this expansion, you can play an all new 18 hole mini golf course! Lighthouse Island will have you meandering around cliff-sides as you are challenged and delighted with new holes!

name: World of Tanks: Blitz - Mega Pack
description: Break into World of Tanks: Blitz with the tornadic Strv 74A2 and a pile of bonuses! Use its three-shell magazine-fed gun to show who owns the battlefield now!

name: World of Tanks: Blitz - Grand Pack
description: Tier VIII FCM 50 t medium tank + 30 days of Premium Account + 1,000,000 credits + 100 of each XP type and Epic Credit boosters + Graphite Rare camouflage + CVC Helmet unique avatar

name: World of Tanks: Blitz - Free Pack
description: Three days of increased profitability! Get 50% more XP and credits, enjoy the improved Garage, and acquire the Undeniable Advantage special camouflage.

name: World of Tanks: Blitz - Resource Pack
description: 7 days of Premium Account + 500 gold + 500,000 credits + 50 of each XP type and Rare Credit boosters + CVC Helmet unique avatar. Speed up your research!

name: World of Tanks: Blitz - Space Pack
description: Enjoy cosmic wealth at a down-to-earth price! There's the D.W. 2 Collector tank in an animated camouflage of celestial beauty. Get it all at a favorable price!

name: Eternal Magic: Keeper
description: The Keeper Pack will emphasize your status!

name: Seek Girl: Charming Girl
description: This DLC contains 8 new characters, all with animations and sounds. You only need to purchase DLC and install it to unlock new characters in "seek girl"!

name: Battlestar Galactica Deadlock: Armistice
description: Armistice is an explosive 8-mission story campaign that brings Season Two of Battlestar Galactica Deadlock to a thrilling conclusion! Unravel Clothos’ plot for dominion, and take part in the legendary Operation Raptor Talon.

name: Battlestar Galactica Deadlock: Reinforcement Pack
description: The Reinforcement Pack DLC brings new content to Battlestar Galactica Deadlock! With four new ships, new types of ammo and some surprises, the Reinforcement Pack is a must for every Colonial or Cylon admiral!

name: Carcassonne: The Official Board Game - Winter and Gingerbread Man
description: A cold winter has hit Carcassonne. The citizens waste very little time before preparing hot beverages and sweet pastries. Life around Carcassonne slows down. Occasionally, the people catch a glimpse of a new character, the gingerbread man.

name: Carcassonne: The Official Board Game - Inns & Cathedrals
description: With the Inns & Cathedrals expansion, Carcassonne's content has been expanded for even more tactical play and competitiveness. With a new meeple and "special" tiles, this expansion will give your game a new twist for even more fun.

name: Nectar of the Gods: The Hive and Spidey Party Bugs Bundle
description: Beetles aren't the only thirsty bugs! This Bug Family Bundle adds The Hive and Spidey Party as playable bug families to the (free) Nectar of the Gods base game. After purchase The Hive and Spidey Party will become playable in all game modes.

name: Miden Tower: Experience x3
description: All characters' experience gained increases by 200%.

name: Miden Tower: Experience & SP x2
description: All characters' experience and SP gained increases by 100%.

name: Dungeon No Dungeon: Reaper
description: Dungeon No Dungeon is a turn-based cult game with a unique hand-drawn art style, with a strategy system based around body parts that you've likely never encountered before.

name: Dungeon No Dungeon: Blood Knight
description: Dungeon No Dungeon is a turn-based cult game with a unique hand-drawn art style, with a strategy system based around body parts that you've likely never encountered before.

name: Wushu Chronicles 2
description: Wushu Chronicles 2 is a martial arts sandbox ARPG game. It is the orthodox sequel to Wushu Chronicles, using the latest self-developed engine flexi3.0, the picture effect is greatly improved. The game uses a seamless big map exploration mechanism, and you can write your arena freely.

name: Cellar: Rags and Knife
description: Adventure game based on a real life story! Get a knife, put on rags and go down!

name: Railroad X: Trans Europ Express VT 11.5
description: This set consists of a complete VT11.5 train set. Popularly named the TEE (for Trans Europ Express), the VT11.5 presented a milestone in Train design in it's heydays. With it's destinct and representative design the TEE turned heads everywhere. The first trains entered service in 1957.

name: Mind-Blowing Girls 2
description: A puzzle game where you need to assemble a complete image from several pieces.

name: Stellar Monarch: The Age of Technology
description: The first expansion for Stellar Monarch. It focuses on technology and science. New alien races, terraformation, megastructures, construction of a fearsome battlestar, random technologies, etc.

name: Chroma Quaternion: Experience & RP x2
description: All characters' experience and RP gained increases by 100%.

name: Chroma Quaternion: Experience x3
description: All characters' experience gained increases by 200%.

name: Magical Drop III: Toretate Zoukangou!
description: The Saturn version of Magical Drop III, named "Magical Drop III: Toretate Zoukangou!", features slower gameplay, different drop patterns (including some balloons generally reserved for single-player modes), different Challenge Mode progression, and longer cutscenes.

name: Incremental Epic Breakers: Automation Pack
description: This DLC includes many useful automations. You can enjoy more comfortable play!

name: WWII: Rising
description: Become a hero during WWII in an Epic Online Multiplayer battles. Play up to 4 different maps with 4 game modes. You can choose to support your teammates with the support class or either fight off the enemy from a long distance with the Recon. The battle has started, come and fight for your country.

name: A Game of Dwarves: Star Dwarves
description: Many Dwarven clans disappeared during the Magic War. One clan even went where no Dwarf has ever gone before; space. Now they have returned and brought with them new and strange technology for their Dwarven brethren.Dig deep and prosper!

name: KovaaK 2.0: Tracking Trainer
description: Designed by KovaaK himself, this guided trainer will help you quickly perfect your target tracking. Featuring five core skills, each with five difficulty levels and a rank system to track your progress. Simple and insightful charts help you isolate problem areas. See how highly you can rank!

name: Territory
description: Engage in intense interspecies conflict Expand your territory! Begin your journey as a tiny rodent struggling to solidify your place in this world. Avoid predators, grow, mark territory, and breed your way to the top of the food chain!

name: Neighbor Watching
description: She is unable to resist our hero's coercion, but remains resolute that she is only doing these things to protect her family. But by reluctantly complying with his lecherous demands, she begins to learn things about herself she never thought possible...

name: Scourge of War: Waterloo - Ligny
description: Following and expanding on the scope of the base game, Scourge of War: Waterloo - Ligny focuses heavily on realistic units, formations, tactics, weapon ranges, and more.

name: Scourge of War: Waterloo - Quatre Bras
description: 1815. Quatre Bras, a small village with no more than 4 houses located in Belgium. But this peaceful place will assume a key in determining the Europe’s fate.

name: Scourge of War: Waterloo - Wavre
description: Following and expanding on the scope of the base game, Scourge of War: Waterloo - Wavre focuses heavily on realistic units, formations, tactics, weapon ranges, and more.

name: Furries & Scalies & Bears OH MY!: The Bear
description: Adds one new character complete with their own story path.

name: Furries & Scalies & Bears OH MY!: Halloween Harvest Festival
description: Adds an October chapter and three new characters to the base game. Who wants to romance a Werewolf? Raise your hands.

name: Furries & Scalies & Bears OH MY!: Charity Pack - Echoes of the Fire
description: Every year, the residents of Kale Bay hold a ceremony to remember those they lost in the Great Fire. Sales go towards The Wild Animal Sanctuary.

name: Furries & Scalies & Bears OH MY!: Charity Bonus
description: In trying to figure out this new world, you decide to help Lois and Wren deal with some injured animals. 100% of sales go towards Earthjustice.

name: 1 Hop
description: Play as a rabbit and go looking for carrots and food bags avoiding the dog. Try to get the mountain first to become the ultimate rabbit, play split screen with your friend and work together to become the King Rabbit.

name: Ant Simulator
description: Are you in a daze?

name: Pepo
description: Pepo is a 2D platformer shooting game that fights boss by firing three colors. Join Pepo's adventure of meeting mutant bosses on the extinct planet and leaving to find Pepo's home!

name: One Piece: Burning Blood - Wanted
description: This amazing Wanted pack gives you access to: 6 alternate versions of playable characters 8 new costumes 4 customizable HUDsA perfect mix to gear up for the fight!

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 3 - DLC Pack 1
description: Extend your experience with 4 new missions and 4 exclusive costumes. This pack also includes 5 costumes from One Piece: Pirate Warriors 2 as a free gift!

name: One Piece: Burning Blood - Wanted 2
description: This One Piece: Burning Blood - Wanted 2 includes: 4 new playable characters 6 costumes 1 customized HUD

name: One Piece: Burning Blood - Platinum Luffy
description: Gear up for the fight with a new exclusive costume for Luffy: a stunning platinum gladiator armor! Based on the famous disguise used by Luffy in Dressrosa arc, it also adds some armor elements as well as Fourth Gear transformation!

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 3 - DLC Pack 2
description: Extend your experience with 4 new missions and 4 exclusive costumes. This pack also includes 5 costumes from One Piece: Pirate Warriors 2 as a free gift!

name: One Piece: Burning Blood - Character Pack
description: This One Piece: Burning Blood - Character Pack contains 6 alternate versions of playable characters featuring new special moves and outfits.

name: Survarium: Vepr 'Molot'
description: If you are looking for great value combined with effective equipment and bonuses, look no further. The Vepr 12 Molot Pack provides you with ample opportunity to survive in Survarium.

name: Dollar Dash: More Ways to Win
description: Now unlock a completely new game mode "Topscorer" with six maps and a mass of new exciting in-game shop content, such as a new victory dance, costumes and in-game icons! The challenge is set, as each player carries a money bag which can hold $1,000.00 dollars.

name: Shade
description: Shade is an atmospheric 2D stealth game. You've just been murdered, and as a new ghost you need to find out why. Move between the worlds of the living and the dead, avoiding enemies and hazards. Uncover hidden truths and use your new powers to determine the fates of those around you.

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Biker Queen
description:
Includes:
- Valentine 'Viper' Chase hero unlock
- Biker Queen suit
- Black glasses
- 700 Crowns

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Metal Zombie
description:
Includes:
- Louis "Bokor" Celine hero unlock
- Metal zombie suit
- Voodoo staff
- 700 Crowns

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Holy Beast
description:
Includes:
- Clyde "Dozen" Mullican hero unlock
- Priest suit
- 100 Golden Crowns

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Street Kid
description:
The streets will tremble!
Includes:
- "Katrina" hero unlock
- "Casual" outfit
- "Aviator" sunglasses
- 700 Crowns

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Lone Wolf
description:
Includes:
- "Clyde" hero unlock
- "Lone Wolf" outfit
- "Claws" weapon
- 700 Crowns

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Age of Nagual
description:
Includes:
- Itz Ocelotl hero unlock
- Aztec High Priest suit
- Royal Macuahuitl
- 300 Golden Crowns

name: Tic-Toc-Tower: Teslagrad
description: Teslakid, from the game Teslagrad, will be a playable character in this new DLC for Tic-Toc-Tower.

name: Hot Spring Hero
description: A hot spring hotel deep in the forest. There are natural silly hostesses, gluttonous dog-eared female chefs, cat-eared female fishermen, and even the hot spring goddess, all for the revival of this hot spring hotel! The adventurous life with the lovely heroines day and night, look forward to your arrival!

name: Labyrinth 3
description: A relaxing labyrinth game.

name: Hunter X: Begin
description: Hunter X: Begin is a stylish action game using the sword.

name: Femboys of the Phalanx
description: The year was 432 BC and Athens was at its peak. Set out on an adventure and meet Femboys and other characters as you make your way through this interesting time in history.

name: Damned Hand: Arcade Mode
description: Improve your shoots by spawning as many bullets and zombies as you want.

name: Tomorrow
description: Rescue your bunny from the hands of the artist known as Jaye!

name: Wildilfe Park 3: Dino Invasion
description: Living with dinosaurs is only fancifulness? No, it is real now. Blow the time dimension and beam the prehistoric jurassic giants with many other futuristic visitor attractions to your Wildlife Park. Dinosaurs, theme park attractions, a bunch of SF service facilities, extinct plants and new decorations.

name: Universe 25: The Loop
description: A Pythonesque Indie point and click adventure game set in the year 2035. Follow the journey of a bureaucrat as he tracks down a malevolent force running experiments on citizens. Armed with a government issue briefcase and a pet mouse, he tracks down an evil agent only to find more than he expected

name: Order of Battle: World War II - Allies Resurgent
description: The second of a trilogy of DLCs featuring World War II from the Allied perspective. The new campaign depicts battles in North Africa, the Mediterranean, and finally in Europe from late 1942 to early 1944.

name: Space Smack!
description: Space Smack! is a 1 to 4 player party game exploding with chaos and sabotage. Enter into the vast expanse of space and clash in a variety of minigames. In this controller-only game, cooperate or undermine your friends to become victorious!

name: Hoard: Dynamite Roll!
description: Hoard: Dynamite Roll! DLC pack is full of new and exciting content including new maps, new units, new powerups, and more achievements!

name: Hoard: Flame-Broiled Sandwich
description: Hoard: Flame-Broiled SANDwich takes the treasure gathering action to the mystical sands of the desert continent! Buildings, units, and terrain have been painstakingly remodeled to spotlight the colorful garb and inspired architecture of the desert kingdoms.

name: Attack: Helicopter Simulator 2020
description: Attack: Helicopter Simulator 2020 is a simulator about a pilot of a helicopter, who battles in some places. Realistic Physics of helicopters.

name: Rompe!
description: Rompe! is a platform game where everything you touch breaks! destroy and rebuild the world around you to escape the dungeon!

name: Punishment Darkness Online: Grand Moun
description: Gives you access to the Grand Moun mission fragmented into four parts, and also gives you access to various improvements.

name: Punishment Darkness Online: Centre Ville
description: Discover the downtown area of Punishment Darkness Online.

name: Phantom Doctrine: Halloween Scare Tactics
description: Phantom Doctrine: Halloween Scare Tactics DLC provides players with new season content to help celebrate everyone's favorite spooky time of the year.

name: Automobilista: Donington Park
description: Donington Park is one of the most internationally renowned and historically significant circuits in the world, The latest version of this classic track modelled with LIDAR scan data now features in Automobilista!

name: Automobilista 2: Spa-Francorchamps
description: The epic Spa-Francorchamps arrives for Automobilista 2, initially featuring a laser-scanned version of the modern track as well as the historical variant from 1993.

name: Automobilista: Formula Truck
description: Formula Truck for Automobilista brings the official simulation of the popular Brazilian Formula Truck series - the most competitive truck racing series in the world!

name: Automobilista: Brazilian Touring Car Classics
description: Brazilian Touring Car Classics for Automobilista

name: Automobilista: Snetterton
description: Snetterton is one of the finest circuits in the UK, blending a challenging and complex layout with fast straights to create a unique challenge!

name: Apocalypse Hotel: The Post-Apocalyptic Hotel Simulator! - The Thin Blue Line!
description: As if zombies, mutants, and aliens weren't trouble enough, everyday humans are now causing trouble on the streets. Help the re-established Swansea Police Force deal with this troublesome humans by repairing and renovating their police station, and by supplying them with a Policeman's Lounge at your hotel for them to relax after work.

name: Apocalypse Hotel: The Post-Apocalyptic Hotel Simulator! - Museum of Horror!
description: Yes the world has ended, yes most people are dead, and yes you are trying to run a hotel under terrible conditions: but that’s no reason not to think about expanding your business to attract more guests. Transform your parents’ museum for hotel paraphernalia into a museum of macabre horror, one that puts on show some of the horrors that took place in the city since the zombie apocalypse!

name: Roll For Confidence
description:
A wholesome story about what it means to be a strong, confident woman.

Everyone in the town of Fernweh knows and adores Sophia, the sweet co-owner of Screen Time arcade. Well, almost everyone. Sophia is tired of avoiding confrontation and keeping herself small. She wants to be a strong woman, but WHAT DOES THAT EVEN MEAN?

name: Flow Free: Warps
description:
Warps: Discover a new dimension of Flow Free!

Warp paths across the board in this challenging new Flow Free game.

Connect matching colors with pipe to create a Flow. Pair all colors, and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle. But watch out, pipes will break if they cross or overlap!

Free play through hundreds of levels, or race against the clock in Time Trial mode. Gameplay ranges from simple and relaxed, to challenging and frenetic, and everywhere in between. How you play is up to you. So, give Flow Free: Warps a try, and experience "mind like water"!

name: Evolution Land
description: Evolution Land is a virtual simulation blockchain game that supports cross-chain interactions. The game will have up to 26 continents, each of which is deployed on a different public chain. The governance parameters, such as the trade tax rate, will be set by players.

name: Magical Drop Touch
description: Magical Drop Touch is a Magical Drop spinoff, released for the iPhone and Android on October 20, 2009. Its release marked the end of a nine-year hiatus following the release of the Game Boy Color Magical Drop.

name: Magical Drop DX
description:
Magical Drop DX is a mobile game released exclusively for Japanese mobile phones by G-Mode. It is based on Magical Drop II with elements from Magical Drop, more particularly, their Super Famicom ports (most notably the title screen and the background used for the 1P vs. CPU mode).

As part of G-Mode's initiative to preserve their feature phone games from the 2000s, the original version of Magical Drop DX was ported to the Nintendo Switch as the 19th game in their G-Mode Archive series.

name: Y: The Game
description: Y: The Game is a passion project platformer where you are a Y avoiding enemies and spikes trying to get all of the objectives in levels. Perfect for hardcore speedrunners, imaginative level creators, and casual players.

name: Mandinga: A Tale of Banzo
description: Mandinga: A tale of Banzo is a role-playing game with game style of Japanese RPG classics, with a unique battle system using dice in turn-based combat, full of strategy and challenges. A game with an immersive history, based on a historical moment in Brazil.

name: Citizens: Far Lands
description: Citizens is a blend between turn based city builder and a puzzler for strategy masterminds. Build a thriving settlement, extract and process resources and manage your population by catering to their needs, thus allowing you to build bigger and better!

name: Wolfsbane
description: Wolfsbane is predominantly an adventure game, which plays for the most part similarly to point-and-click examples of the genre, despite the unusual side-scrolling perspective. The player must explore the town, talk to its inhabitants, and gather information and items in order to solve the mystery. The game utilizes a branching dialogue system. It also has action elements, present in the sporadic combat and a health meter for Axel.

name: Fantasy Sliding Puzzle 2
description: Challenging sliding puzzles with various levels of difficulty, featuring epic fantasy female characters and backgrounds.

name: Wraiths of Sentinel
description: Harness the phenomenal abilities of an unliving wraith to preserve liberty—or to subvert it. Will you use your powers over quintessence to save your nation, or will you profit from its broken shell?

name: Dumb: Treasure
description: Use a remote-controlled robot to find the treasure lost under the bed.

name: Jaksaljabi
description: Jaksaljabi is a kinetic novel that you can experience unique set-up and story.

name: Sit Down, Please
description: Step into a scientist's shoes in a story driven game which leads you to discover a mysterious and unknown world by torturing characters. In order to find out all the hidden secrets, try to keep the guinea pigs alive for as long as possible by using the scientist's machinery.

name: Tales of a Rabbit: The Story of Willie Hop
description: Tales of a Rabbit: The Story of Willie Hop is a 3D educational platformer about an adventurous rabbit on a grand treasure hunt! This short 3D platformer is designed to teach players how to solve math problems that deal with the order of operations, one-step equations, and two-step equations.

name: Voidwalkers: The Gates of Hell
description: You are one of the Voidwalkers, tasked with a life-long oath to defend the Gates Of Hell from any who would try to cross into the land of the living. After a thousand years without incident, thousands of undead warriors have begun crossing the plane, and it's up to you to stop them!

name: Mechanica: A Ballad of the Rabbit and Mercury
description: 5029 AD, "Guillotine", the Japanese territory on Mercury, a city full of neon signs and drunks. You will explore the beautiful cyberpunk-style 2D world, play music to the residents of Mercury to gather intelligence, and finally achieve the goal of saving the world.

name: Barn Finders: Bid Wars
description: Take part in an endless number of auctions. Win access to more garages, abandoned containers, unclaimed luggage and sell found items for a lot of money. Become the king of bidding. Bid'em All!

name: Depth: Wilhelm Diver
description: Wilhelm Pack includes the Wilhelm diver skin along with the Mark V Dive Knife skin.

name: Bubble Star Party
description: It's a 3D multiplayer world with more than 30 characters with various skills to unlock, and a level editor with more than 500 terrain modules, dozens of obstacles and traps. In addition to built-in levels, you can make your level!Let other players have fun cooperating and competing in your level!

name: Trains Continental
description: Build your own transcontinental railroad in western America of XIX century. Collect and manage tracks, rebuild them to find the most optimal way for the train to cross even the most difficult terrains. Beware though! The clock is ticking and you need to finish the work before the time runs out!

name: Atom
description: A simple hydrogen atom simulator.

name: Kick Ball
description: Kick Ball is a puzzle-style game, in which the player will have to go through challenges such as saws, thorns, bombs in order to reach the goal.

name: First Class Escape: The Train of Thought
description: "First Class Escape: The Train of Thought" is a co-operative atmospheric escape room puzzle game, set in a beautifully realized vintage train. Do you think you have what it takes to solve the puzzles and escape the train?

name: Ji Mo Shen Ming De Xin Yuan Shou Ji
description: What kind of courage and change can the connection between people bring? The story takes place in the ancient eastern country, where a foreign girl from Silazi kingdom got involved with various humans, spirits and even gods. Here, she heard voices unknown to others and met people unknown to others.

name: Tarakan: Point and Click Adventure
description: Tarakan is a puzzle mystery adventure, inspired by escape room style games. Take control of a submarine and visit multiple coastal laboratories. Solve puzzles as you go to unlock the tools you need to solve the mystery!

name: Robogal
description: This is a role-playing game. In the game, you will play the role of bio robot manufacturer. Through the data collection of prototype, you can make the robot customers want.

name: Demon Lord Jill: Revival
description: “Jill”‘s family is a two hundred thousand years-lasted Demon consanguinity. But Jill was in deep trouble as his father passed away. The number of demons and humans were decreasing.

name: Helper Cat
description: Helper cat is a puzzle game, in which your objective is to help a magician, putting his potions in the correct places, but for that you'll have to face all the puzzles in the castle.

name: Fantasy Match Puzzle
description: Are you ready to test your eyes with Fantasy Match Puzzle, your seek and find skills will be challenged like never before. Develops your secret seeker skill to find objects. This is a puzzle game similar to Hidden Object games, in which you have to find the objects while the clock is ticking.

name: Portals World
description: A sci-fi action strategy tower defense digging 2D top down game, Dig, explore, build production and defensive facilities, take care of robot's battery and manage power wisely..

name: Opa: Definitive Edition
description: Opa Definitive Edition is a 2D drawn obstacle-based game. You will guide a happy square through increasingly more difficult levels, enemies, and bosses with unique environment in their levels.

name: Namsiku: Path of the Fang
description: Namsiku: Path of the Fang is a 2.5D story-driven adventure game with elements of puzzles, stealth, action, and combat. Join Namsiku, a shaman in search of his daughter, who has been captured by strange beings who want to seize the precious gold used as an offering to receive the blessing of the gods

name: Captain vs. Sky Pirates: Pyramids
description: Captain vs. Sky Pirates: Pyramids is a world map DLC for Captain vs. Sky Pirates. Apart from a new world, the game also features 30 new levels, enemies, epic bosses, and upgraded weapons and explosives.

name: MBHL20
description: MBHL20 is a simulation hockey game that allows you to not only manage your team, but hone your skills as an individual player in the MiniBall Hockey League! You can pick your position to play with and against fully autonomous players in a 30 team league in your quest to win the cup!

name: VR Hot
description: VR HOT is a virtual adult experience for creating and interacting with dream partners. It gives you the opportunity to explore your most intimate desires in a non-judgmental surrounding. VR HOT offers a virtual environment and a construction kit for dream partners and the interaction with them.

name: Tank Shoot 2D: Battle to save City Flag
description: Tank Shoot 2D can be played by 1 or 2 players.Protect your flag: Game over if enemies shoot flag.Kill all enemies to reach next stage. New stages bring new enemies, new types of walls and new challenges.This game promises countless hours of fun.

name: Blockee
description: Blockee is a simple slide-puzzle game. Just slide the blocks!

name: 三国演义之蜀汉传奇
description: "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms: Legend of Shu Han" is an RPG game with a theme of the history of the Three Kingdoms that happened in China. In the game, player operates Liu Bei's army to suppress anti Han bandits on the vast land of China, maintain the legitimacy of the Han Dynasty.

name: Grow Big or Go Home: Ultimate Edition
description: Play as Bruce, the world's most talented indoor gardener, in this 2D pixel-art puzzle game. Through now 30+ fast-paced levels, you will travel to different locations and eras in order to water, light, and tend to plants with the high-tech magic of a watering can and a reflective mirror.

name: Galaxy Reavers: Titan
description: A paid DLC for “Galaxy Reavers”, allowing commanders to unlock the giant warship “Titan” and build up a more diverse and powerful fleet to challenge higher level stages!

name: New Gundam Breaker: Special Mission - Her Name is Super Fumina
description: The day-one special mission "Her Name is Super Fumina" is the only mission where you'll find the titular Super Fumina! Complete it to receive a special Fumina Ticket that can be exchanged for any part you like!

name: Balloon Saga
description: Balloon Saga is a physics based game in which the player needs to solve logic problems and fly to the top of the mountain with the help of balloons. Control the objects using your mouse. Get stars for completing the levels successfully.

name: Tactical Three Kingdoms: Strategy & War
description: Recruit famous heroes from the Three Kingdoms era to end the turbulent age!

name: Planet Bounce: Devastator DLC Pack
description: If you need more weapons and power the Devastator pack is what you are looking for. Gain 2 new ships and 3 upgrades in this DLC.

name: 20XX: Draco Character
description: This DLC introduces Draco, a powerful playable Contractor who wields an endless arsenal of unique Weapons. Master the shadow-dashing Vega Claws and the platform-creating Rapture Bubble to destroy your foes in style!

name: Valkyria Chronicles 4: The Two Valkyria
description:
This cataclysmic reunion of "1933 EC. Behind the Empire's towering facade, Crymaria awaits a crucial test with Lieutenant Colonel Selvaria Bles.

This cataclysmic reunion of the two Valkyria will determine Crymaria's fate.

This story can be played after completing Chapter 18 of the main story. Complete this extra story to unlock Crymaria, Nikola, Chiara, and Selvaria for use in the main game, along with swimsuit uniforms for each. To access this story, go to Book Mode > Menu > Extra Stories."the two Valkyria will determine Crymaria's fate.

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3: V Generation - Let's Get Nepucated
description: Let's Get Nepucated DLC unlocks a special event called Nepucation

name: SpaceXplorer
description: Desktop and VR interactive space experience/game. Fan homage to SpaceX's efforts of inspiring humanity to finally become a spacefaring civilization! Experience launches, flights and landings of starships first-hand, engage with challenging mini-games, explore funny memes and more. :-)

name: Cursed Night: The House
description: 1972, Texas. One night, you had a car accident near the Stafford farm. You wanted to get help, so you went there. But it was your worst decision of your life. What after came...it was the real CURSED NIGHT for you.

name: Speedway Challenge 2021
description: Speedway Challenge 2021 is a 3D speedway game. Feel speedway emotions thanks to realistic riding physics. Play online mode with friends or local in career mode, league mode, challenges, tournament and quick matches. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Heroines of Swords & Spells: Green Furies
description: An Anti-Heroic DLC for an epic and funny jRPG adventure with intricately detailed world and story. Revisit this world and look at the familiar story through the eyes of completely different protagonists.

name: Senko no Ronde 2: Rounder Karel
description: Use Karel and his rounder, Azureus in Arcade, Online and Offline Battle modes.

name: Grey Zone: Altman
description: You are a mercenary of the elite unit of the largest syndicate "Alpha." You were sent to Pluton, where you will have to face difficulties. Spitfire character of the protagonist will lead him to the most dangerous places of this world. His fate is completely in your hands! [/ b]

name: D&D Lords of Waterdeep: Undermountain
description: Undermountain, and expansion for Lords of Waterdeep, gives players new Dungeons & Dragons challenges in an exciting new setting beneath the city of Waterdeep. Test your skills with new Lord, Quest and Intrigue cards, against an expanded city with new buildings and agents.

name: The Maze
description: The Maze- a giant maze set to challenge any puzzle fanatic.

name: Imperiums: Troy
description: Imperiums: Troy is a small-scale tactical scenario that sets the stage for participation in one of the most epic battles of ancient times. Join the greatest of Trojan and Greek heroes and prove your worth on the plains of Troy!

name: Through Hell to Heaven
description: Help Amy survive the Vile Demons in Hell in order to find the Portal and Ascend to Heaven.

name: Trash Can Dungeon: Battle Against the Zoo
description: This is a sample game created in "RPG Maker MZ" by Shitsudo Kei. Keep the peace in Neo Tokyo in this Dungeon Action RPG

name: Chat Millions: Stream Quiz Game
description: Play the classic 4-choice quiz with a new twist, and see if your twitch chat has what it takes to win the millions.

name: Hakuoki: Edo Blossoms - Edo Treasure Box
description: Get more romance out of your favorite warrior bachelors in these six never-before-seen episodes!

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 4
description:
Dive into the Sunken Kingdom to solve puzzles and unearth the secrets of its Siren Shrines, or battle through waves of Ocean Crawlers and Sirens to raid the Siren Treasuries.

Seasonal progression allows all players to earn Renown and rewards, with a fresh array of Trials and Deeds to boost progress and an optional Plunder Pass to expand the reward pool.

name: Wisper
description: Walk through a beautiful world filled with magical creatures, learn about them, the people, and the world on your journey to become a Wisper.

name: Raid!
description: Raid is a three dimensional, base building tower defense game. Build and upgrade towers, capture castles and defend against increasing waves of enemies. Expend your coin in efforts to fend off your attackers while preparing for the final wave before you can move onto the next plot of land.

name: Pangea
description: Unique combination of turn-based strategy, tabletop game and roguelike. Make moves according to the roll of the dice on a randomly generated field and destroying enemies in tactical battles. Available 4 different factions.

name: Knightly Passions: Episode 1
description: These are the escapades of a young hunter seeking his missing sister. Adventure awaits you in a medieval fantasy world filled with bloodthirsty monsters and deadly traps. You’ll make new friends, experience powerful temptations while meeting gorgeous girls, undergo every trial, and vanquish evil!

name: Barro: Track Pack 2
description: Additional tracks for the game.

name: Rogue's Tale: Bloodlines
description: Rogue's Tale - Bloodlines is the second expansion for Rogue's Tale. It allows the player to choose a bloodline during character creation after they have been unlocked during earlier runs.

name: Barro F: Cars Pack
description: Cars pack

name: Barro: Track Pack 1
description: Additional tracks for the game.

name: Valor Legends: Eternity
description: Welcome to Valor Legends: Eternity! It's time to embark on your amazing adventure in the Oasis to fight the Shadow forces! Valor Legends: Eternity is a 3D idle game.

name: Empires Apart: Korean Civilization
description: The Noblemen of Korea lead the offensive! Play as the magnificent Koreans - an advanced civilization that focuses on gunpowder units and economy management.

name: Empires Apart: Arab Civilization
description: The blades of faithful shine on the battlefield! Play as the relentless Arabs - an advanced civilization that focuses on knowledge and conversion.

name: Empires Apart: Mongol Civilization
description: The Golden Horde rides into battle! Play as the unstoppable Mongols – an aggressive nomadic civilization that focuses solely on cavalry.

name: Empires Apart: French Civilization
description: The French Knights charge into battle! Play as the proud French – a Defensive civilization that focuses on formidable cavalry, great economy, technology and siege weapons.

name: REM Cycles
description: One night, ten people fall asleep and find themselves in someone else's dream. Guide these unlikely heroes as they traverse strange lands filled with enemies and memories. Confront a mysterious antagonist and witness chats between battles while you search for reason in sleep.

name: NITE Team 4: Operation Withering Dusk
description: A major data breach has left Kotok Analytics security in question. They hire NT4 to find the data, destroy it, and attempt to bring the perpetrators to justice.

name: Mighty!
description: MIGHTY! is a fast-paced top-down roguelike set inside cramped dungeon walls which forces constant resource management and stat min/maxing skills to get as far as you possibly can in an endless creep of levels.

name: Captain vs. Sky Pirates: Post Apocalyptic City
description:
This pack contains:
- new world map Post Apocalyptic City
- New levels
- New World
- Enemies
- 30 levels
- Epic bosses
- Upgrade weapons and explosives

name: Captain vs. Sky Pirates: Forest
description:
This pack contains
- new world map Forest
- New levels
- New World
- Enemies
- 30 levels
- Epic bosses
- Upgrade weapons and explosives

name: Captain vs. Sky Pirates: Moon Base
description:
This pack contains:
- new world map Moon Base
- Protect the moon base from evil pirates
- New levels
- New World
- Enemies
- 30 levels
- Epic bosses
- Upgrade weapons and explosives

name: Captain vs. Sky Pirates: Evil Village
description:
This pack contains:
- new world map Evil Village
- New levels
- New World
- Enemies
- 30 levels
- Epic bosses
- Upgrade weapons and explosives

name: Covert Commando
description: A no frills rogue ultra-lite top down dual stick looter shooter.

name: The Survivalists: Monkey Business
description: Survive in style. Add some flair to your wardrobe as you explore The Survivalists. The Monkey Business pack contains 3 player hats and 6 monkey hats, all as part of the Box-ex side quest.

name: Hero Siege: Class - Samurai
description: Samurai is an offensive melee fighter with lots of movability.

name: Hero Siege: Class - Shaman
description: The Shaman- Unlock the Shaman class.

name: Hero Siege: Class - Amazon
description: Get Amazon and exclusive Jungle content!

name: Hero Siege: Class - Marauder
description: Marauder is a semi-ranged class that uses chains, bombs and a flail to demolish it's enemies

name: Inspector Schmidt: A Bavarian Tale
description: "Inspector Schmidt - A Bavarian Tale" is a third-person detective RPG, set in rural Bavaria in 1866. As the young Medical student Valentin Schmidt you will travel to Wolpertshofen in order to write a report of the peoples' living situation for the King, when a sudden death causes turmoil in the small Bavarian village.

name: Fatal Evidence: The Cursed Island - Collector's Edition
description: Play these great object finding games full of puzzles, brain teasers and mini-games! You need to seek and find hidden objects and win this fun search and find finding object games!

name: Soaring
description: Soaring is a challenging platformer where you must climb ever upwards to reach what you have lost, just mind your step !

name: Big Byz Wars
description: Run'n'Gun in dystopian sci-fi 2.5D side scroller. As a mercenary of the biggest flying city - Byzantium aka 'Big Byz', you will deal with some delicate issues and missions.

name: The Advisor: Episode 1 - Royal Pain
description: The Advisor Series is a player-driven narrative where your choices & decisions, both in the game, and out of the game, determine how future episodes unfold. Play the role of villain protagonist Magnus the Magician, as he wreaks havoc across the land, one well-placed fireball at a time!

name: Superdimension Neptune vs. Sega Hard Girls: Fever Gauge Plus
description: Fever Gauge Plus will be able to cause the Fever Gauge to increase drastically.

name: Superdimension Neptune vs. Sega Hard Girls: If's Gust of Wind
description: A new class for IF.

name: Superdimension Neptune vs. Sega Hard Girls: Exp Expert
description: EXP Expert' will be able to drastically increase Exp obtained post-battle.

name: Superdimension Neptune vs. Sega Hard Girls: Segami's Astral Brave
description: A new class for Segami.

name: Mido and Di
description: Mido is an alien kid having nightmares about zombie aliens. One night he draws a creature, Di, and it comes alive to teach Mido how to fight zombies.

name: Tower Tactics: Liberation
description: Tower Tactics: Liberation fuses deck-building games and roguelikes to modernize the tower defense genre like never before - make your way through procedurally generated maps, collect valuable trinkets and manage your arsenal to defend yourself against the Salkoth!

name: Moon Base
description: In this project you can become an astronaut on the first moon base in human history. You can drive a rover, do some jobs with drilling devices, figure out how solar panels work and walk on the moon surface.

name: Slumhack
description: Slumhack is an action-based puzzle game set in a post-pandemic world, one just like ours. Play as Neriko, a young girl living in a modern ghetto born of such reality, and hack your way through the streets of Cyberia to bring back hope and peace to the slum.

name: Idle Expanse: Reality Shifter
description: This DLC unlocks alternate realities 101 through 1000.

name: Idle Expanse: Chronoscope Technology
description: This DLC gives you a preview of whether or not a planet contains Time Crystals or contract givers.

name: Counter-Strike Nexon: Studio - Zombies: Oz's Trio
description:
One of the most well-known tales, The Wonderful Wizard of Oz, and its lessons can easily be converted to the land of zombies. A true hero should have a strong heart and courage to fight the endless enemies, use their brains so as to come up with tactics against the toughest of bosses and not get overpowered by zombies, and most importantly, a true hero must have a good team to challenge the impossible.

However, Zombies: Oz's Trio is no fairy tale and happy endings depend strictly on battlefield experience and firepower. We introduce a new set of unique DLC weapons that will help you come back home safely.

name: Counter-Strike Nexon: Studio - Zombies: Dragon Set + Permanent Character
description: Three solid weapons that represent the core of classic CS combat, with the added presence and zeal of a Dragon.

name: Counter-Strike Nexon: Studio - Zombies: Rivals
description: Rivals are back in force! Among the staple Counter-Strike Nexon: Studio - Zombies characters, Jennifer steps out in her new army outfit and Natasha takes on a casual uniform. Army-style Jennifer and casual-style Natasha, they both have high Attack levels but low Ammo Reserve levels, which is perfect for attackers.

name: Bean and Nothingness
description: A difficult tile-based puzzle game about turning beans into monsters -- and monsters back into beans.

name: Blaster Master Zero: EX Character - Shantae
description: This unlocks the EX Character "Shantae."

name: Blaster Master Zero: EX Character - Shovel Knight
description: This unlocks the EX Character "Shovel Knight."

name: Stayhomer
description: "Disinfect" all anti-lockdown protesters.

name: FootRock 2: VR
description: Footrock - game for the whole family. You will become a legendary sportsman, who will go through the fascinating and unpredictable levels on football arenas.

name: Kyle is Famous: Kyle is Santa
description: In the cold, barren midwinter, a sole figure rises from his slumber. Kyle, readying his day, looks on that which he will encounter... Oh my goodness, why are there elves growing out of his skin? Who gave that child a claymore??? Why is Rachel turning into a puss lump of flesh???

name: Slime Rancher: VR Playground
description: Experience the adorable slimes of Slime Rancher - in VR! Slime Rancher: VR Playground is a standalone experience based off of the world of Slime Rancher! Vac, feed, and play with slimes like never before! Explore three VR playgrounds based off of the Dry Reef, Moss Blanket, and Ancient Ruins. Get face-to-face with your favorite slimes like: pink, tabby, and phosphor. Sit down and relax in a field of flowers or take a dip in a puddle slime-filled pond. The VR Playground is a unique Slime Rancher experience created especially for VR. It does not include the entirety of the original game.

name: Flappy Galaxy: Master Level
description: A New Challenge awaits you in a more difficult level.

name: Nights of Azure 2: Bride of the New Moon - Side Story: Time Drifts Through the Moonlit Night
description:
An additional side story, "Time Drifts Through the Moonlit Night", will be added to the game. The side story can be triggered in the Hotel Lobby, after Chapter 2 is completed, and will take place between Chapters 2-7.

Additionally, "Requiem Pink" costume for Aluche, which boosts all parameters, is included in this DLC.

name: Nights of Azure 2: Bride of the New Moon - Side Story: The Foreigner in a Wonderland of Sweets
description: An additional side story, "The Foreigner in a Wonderland of Sweets", will be added to the game. The story is triggered after you return to the hotel after speaking to Eleanor about the "Wonderland of Sweets" in Chapter 3.

name: Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed
description:
Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed is a video game in the open-world action-adventure genre, serving as a remake of the original 2006 game. It is the sequel to the remade Destroy All Humans! and marks the sixth instalment in the franchise.

In this game, players take on the role of Crypto, navigating through diverse global locations such as England, Russia, and the United States. The objective is to complete various missions and overcome human adversaries. The gameplay incorporates a range of weapons and abilities, allowing players to defeat enemies by employing tactics such as mind-controlling humans and utilizing advanced alien technology.

name: Outcast: A New Beginning
description: Explore the breathtaking alien world of Adelpha, support the local Talans in their struggles and fight your way through fast-paced battles against invading robot forces in this 3rd-person, open world, action adventure sequel to the 1999 cult classic.

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends
description: Race your way to victory on bikes, ATVs and UTVs in MX vs ATV Legends! Featuring massive new open environments, plus a career mode that lets you experience all the risks and rewards of becoming a world-famous professional rider. Become an off-road racing legend in your own right! Your time is now!

name: SuperPower 3
description: Superpower 3 is a modern geopolitical sim in a planet Earth setup. Rule the world or challenge your knowledge about demography, economics, military strategy, as well as political issues across the globe. Compete with or against other players, or just try to do better than the real-life politicians.

name: Mist Train Girls
description: Jump into the world of Mist Train Girls! Collect a harem of military girls and take them on an adventure to rid Iris Cloud of the wicked Mist that envelopes it! Mist Train Girls story-driven RPG, fully-voiced! Take on opponents with a deep, turn-based battle RPG system with unlimited possibilities! The continent of Iris Cloud was shrouded in a thick mist.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: The Cosmic Shake
description: Wish-granting Mermaid’s Tears in the hands of SpongeBob and Patrick… What could go wrong? Sure, the very fabric holding the universe together could come undone, opening portals into wild Wishworlds. But that’s nothing our favorite sponge can’t handle- with the right cosmic costume!

name: Mage Chess
description: 3D Chess game with fully animated pieces.

name: Lawn Invaders
description:
The year is 2075, join everybody's favourite millennial gaming grandpa as he fends off creatures he hallucinates after doing nothing but play games his entire life.

LawnInvaders is an arcade shooter where the player must defend the lawn from a variety of falling enemies, these enemies slowly break apart the ground making it more difficult to defend.

name: Death Trials
description: Before you know it, you've woken up in a SURVIVAL HORROR GAME. Total darkness. It feels like you're in a rusty metal cage, which hangs in mid air. There's a small light against the wall twenty feet away, but you can't get out. Just as your eyes adjust, the cage door slowly opens... You jump from the cage... three feet below to the floor... and into the darkness...

name: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers
description: Set in the chaotic final years of the Ming Dynasty, WUCHANG: Fallen Feathers is an exploration of the hauntingly beautiful landscapes of imperial China and the battle against mysterious forces that transform a grim reality to supernatural horror.

name: Coin Treasures
description:
Coin Treasures is a game like the classic coin pusher/dozer games combined with incremental progress, realistic physics and stunning graphics.

Unlock artifact spawning which will stay in the world after you've won the item. Collect your own treasure room filled with the treasure you find.

Unlock powerfull powerups but be careful this also unlocks power"downs". Try to get them off the play area to avoid temporary penalties. Collecting the powerups will give you temporary benifits.

The aim of the game is to keep upgrading everything.

name: Color by Number
description: The architect of The Tower designed other buildings as well, but he didn’t always have the Tower’s budget. What’s become of Jake now—and just how many squatters are there?

name: Grey Tower
description: You're no hero, so when your friend Jake asks you to join him in exploring a ruined castle several days' journey to the north, you refuse to have anything to do with the idea. Well, that was weeks ago, and you haven't heard from Jake. Much against your better judgement, you decide to go find out what became of him...and maybe pick up some treasure along the way.

name: Flow Fit
description:
Flow Fit is a little bit crossword, a little bit jigsaw puzzle, and a ton of fun!
Fit blocks, make words! Choose from tons of themed puzzles on your favorite topics and exercise your brain with new challenges.

Flow Fit has more than 1000 themed word puzzles designed by New York Times published puzzle designers. With tons of different categories, board designs, and a variety of difficulty levels, Flow Fit provides hours of fun whether you’re a logic puzzle novice or a crossword genius!

name: Majestic Part I: Alien Encounter
description:
The Majestic was Earth's greatest space liner offering unparalleled luxury and comfort. She disappeared on her maiden voyage, no-one could trace her. Then, about a week later, a lifeboat with survivors was discovered out near the Pleiades but the captain and a couple of other people were still missing. The search went on but turned up nothing and eventually it was abandoned. Some time later a feint signal was detected. It was thought that this could be the Majestic's beacon but it was so very faint that no-one was sure. So a field archaeologist was dispatched to investigate.

Majestic Part 1: Alien Encounter is a science fiction point-and-click adventure game. The player takes on the role of the aforementioned archaeologist who locates the Majestic and explores the ship to discover what happened. Unlike traditional point-and-click adventures, however, the player explores the ship by sending up to four probes into the vessel. Each probe can link to systems, scan, cut holes in things with a torch, and pick up objects for examination. As the game progresses the probes can be upgraded to give them additional capabilities. They are controlled via an interface that displays the probe's view in a window the center of the screen. The same interface is used to save and restore the game.

The game is entirely mouse-controlled and has a point system which measures the player's progress through the game.

name: Deltarune
description: UNDERTALE's parallel story, DELTARUNE. Meet new and old characters in a tale that steps closer to its end, chapter by chapter. Dodge bullets in nonviolent RPG battles as you listen to funky, funky music.

name: Mantra II: The Blood of Saric
description: Sequel to Mantra; real-time RPG.

name: Monopoly
description: Everything you love about Monopoly is now here for the Mac. Classic Monopoly is a mouse click away as you engage in the pursuit of great fortunes. With computer enhanced graphics and billions of different dice sequences it's never the same game twice. Wheel and deal against the supreme game challenger, your Mac. Or play with up to eight players, in this ultimate computer version of the best selling boardgame of all time. The thrill of buying and selling railroads and properties and collecting rent on Park Place awaits you. Pick a "Chance" card and advance to Boardwalk. Or throw doubles three times and "Go directly to Jail" You can play with the "official" Monopoly game rules, or customize them to fit the way you play at home. But as always, the richest player wins. And both color and black and white versions of the program are included - making it perfect for your desktop Powerbook Macintosh. This is a must for the library of any Mac gamer.

name: Secrets of the Pyramids
description:
Secrets of the Pyramids is an edutainment title that includes 3 modes: a movie, discovery and game mode. The Movie mode presents a dramatic reconstruction of a series of events that could have taken place in Ancient Egypt. The Discovery mode describes Ancient Egypt culture, religion and history.

In the Game mode you will follow Harold Peabody - dreamer, adventurer and optimist - on his quest for the hidden tomb of the mythical Pharaoh Ankh-Re. After finding a way to open the door to the pyramid, the player has to explore the pyramid, find useful items and overcome various obstacles. Stepping on the wrong tile or opening a wrong door may result in the untimely death of the hero. To avoid traps and decipher clues the player has to consult an "English-Hieroglyphics translator" found early in the game.

Secrets of the Pyramids is a short, inventory-based adventure game with a simple interface (with a "look" and "use" icon). The player can only save one game at a time (by pressing the S-key). The game comes with a soundtrack and some sound effects; comments are shown in message windows that pop-up (no voices).

name: Mystery Island
description: Millionaire James Harvey has died and his son inherited it all. Now he is missing. It is your job to solve the mystery!

name: Ocean Bound
description: Ocean Bound is a survival game where you and the crew of your ship are stranded on an unknown island. The main goal is to build a ship to escape back to civilization, but before you can do that you must establish a colony, collect resources and try to stay alive. But once you manage to escape, the next level simply strands you in another island. There are sixty levels in total, featuring all sorts of islands, some as big as continents, and each one requires a different strategy to stay alive.

name: Palace of Sand
description: One of the best World Builder text-based adventures, Palace of Sand sees the player chasing after their pal who's scarpered off to the east to check out the Sultan's daughter.

name: Radical Castle
description:
Radical Castle is a point-and-click adventure game released for Macintosh in 1986 and distributed as shareware.

Players assume the role of the 'Squire', who after mistaking the princess for a serving wench, is given a choice by the King between death and a quest to recover an oracle stolen by a wizard.

name: RoboWar
description: In RoboWar, you design and program robot warriors, and let them battle it out in the arena. A complete programming interface allows you to design the robots appearance, sound effects and behavior.

name: Sensory Overload
description:
Advanced sight and sound technology makes Sensory Overload™ the most realistic Mac action game you've ever played. Lifelike motion, vivid lighting & shadowing, and extraordinary environments create unparalleled graphic realism. And the rich stereo sound effects and haunting background tracks will make your heart pound.

You rub your eyes and then stagger to your feet. You have no idea where you are, and you can't remember a single thing. There are vicious terrorists hunting you relentlessly, and dead bodies lay all around. As you explore the twists and turns of this action-packed world, you begin to unravel Dr. Craven's sinister plan. Now you must do everything you can to elude these ruthless killers, find the AlphaChannel unit and escape with your life.

Sensory Overload™ features spiral ramps and stairs, detailed texture-mapping, and multi-level play with fully animated characters, setting the new standard for thrilling three-dimensional action. Sensory Overload™ is more than a game. It's an experience.

name: Shadow Keep
description: A fun top-town adventure/questing game where you fight weird creatures, find treasure, and talk to entertaining NPCs.

name: SimHarbor
description:
You have been asked to build a harbor for a town near the Atlantic ocean. With a starting capital of £200,000 from the city council, the work begins!

SimHarbor is a harbor building sim. Set up the piers, equipment and storage needed to service over 120 different ships. Expand your infrastructure, balance your finances and protect your harbor from disasters in this compelling sim.

Reading the manual before jumping in is highly recommended, this is a contender for the HyperCard engine's most complicated game.

name: Space Camel
description: An interstellar rendition of Camel or Desert Trek. Keep an eye on the air, fuel, and hull meters!

name: Swamp Witch
description: A World Builder adventure game.

name: The Dungeon Revealed
description: Commercial re-release of the popular shareware roguelike, The Dungeon of Doom. Along with a new look to the interface, this version adds secret "vault" areas and a "Gate Keeper" boss on every fifth level. To escape the dungeon, you must descend to the 40th level and return with the Orb of Carnos.

name: Theldrow
description: Theldrow is a turn-based computer role-playing game, written in 1989 by Glenn Andreas. The game featured a turn-based first person perspective interface similar to early Might and Magic games, pixel art (originally black-and-white), and a very original fantasy setting. It is a very difficult game.

name: Twisted! Deluxe
description: Twisted! Deluxe is an updated, full-color version of Twisted!, an excellent shareware adventure game for the Macintosh by Ray Dunakin. The original Twisted! was a fun text-adventure-with-graphics game coded with World Builder, a now-discontinued adventure game application for the Mac. This Deluxe version features all-new color graphics and a streamlined point-and-click interface in place of a text parser. Twisted! Deluxe starts out similar to the movie of the same name: you are a meteorologist, a "storm chaser" sent to investigate a tornado. Before long, you end up in Land of Ooz, a bizarre fantasy world filled with talking dragons and other strange creatures, and numerous fascinating puzzles that range from math logic, to riddles and traditional inventory-based puzzles.

name: Vampire Castle
description:
"Warning! The Vampire awakes at midnite!"

An adventure game with optional MacinTalk speech.

name: Muddy Water
description: This time you’re on your own. While Jake is enjoying a busman’s honeymoon in Revenue City, Nevada, you learn about a stolen sceptre—and, more important, a major reward. But can you drink the water?

name: A Night in Berry
description:
France - XVIth century.
Mathilde's father has fallen into a coma. When a healer happens to pass in her village, she decides to grab the opportunity to save him.

name: Out of Gas
description:
Jack is driving home, when he runs out of gas just a couple blocks from the gas station.

He now needs to walk there and return with some gas.

name: Old Woman Beardychin and the Scruffedy Bumtious
description: Old Woman Beardychin is quite content to follow the same routine day after day, when suddenly her life is turned upside down by the arrival, and subsequent departure, of a Scruffedy Bumtious. Thus begins an epic journey, full of peril and mishaps, which takes Beardychin far away from her safe and comfortable home. Will she ever find the Bumtious again?

name: Pendek
description: You are Yandi, a villager who works for the Pandang Logging Company deep in the Sumatran jungle. An accident leaves you stranded and alone in the jungle. You must survive, you must escape. But who knows what you might come across in the process?

name: Perils of Poom
description:
You need money fast so what'd you do? Well, you end up getting a job which involves going round the galaxy in search of a rare (illegal) drug for a large cash reward, of course.

With 4 different planets to visit, a short bonus section to unlock at the end, and..er.. probably some other attributes.

name: Rabbids at Versailles
description:
The Rabbids have invaded the gardens of Versailles!
It's up to you to fix the damages and flush them out!

A game in augmented reality and playable only in the Gardens of the Palace of Versailles.
This original treasure hunt will allow visitors, young and old, to explore the Gardens in a fun and educational way, on the trail of a mysterious Rabbid Louis XIV. In the alleys, the flowerbeds or near the basins of the French gardens, play and find the Rabbids to discover the largest outdoor museum in a new light.
This application is published by the Palace of Versailles and was created thanks to a sponsorship from Ubisoft. Intended for children from 8 years old, this application allows you to discover the Gardens while having fun.
It is only available to download in France, playable at the Gardens of the Palace of Versailles.

name: Baseball
description: Sin descripción

name: Hit Me
description: Sin descripción

name: Sea Battle
description: Sin descripción

name: Deathsmiles I & II: Gothic wa Mahou Otome Love Max Edition
description:
The Gothic wa Mahou Otome Love Max Edition includes:
・ Game software for PS4 "Death Smiles I / II" (special edition: OST CD + Special DLC )
・ B2 tapestry drawn by Dr. Junya Inoue
・ "Death Smiles" original acrylic panel
・ "Jill Ballard" A4 microfiber towel

name: Sakura no Kumo: Scarlet no Koi
description: This is the consumer port of the title that was released as a PC game in September 2020. For the consumer version, new episodes drawn by the original team of Riko Hakoeda and Tom Fuyuakane have been added. In addition, a new opening and theme song have been added, and the cast has also been renewed to bring you all the charm of the consumer version.

name: Destruction Derby
description: Exidy's first driving game, which was later licensed to Chicago Coin and released as "Demolition Derby". As part of the deal, Exidy stopped production of the game to avoid competing with their new licensee.

name: TV Pinball
description: Exidy's first game, a ball-and-paddle game inspired by pinball mechanics.

name: Score
description: Developed by Exidy, Score is another extension of the Destruction Derby concept with the cars replaced by bar patrons. Set in a singles bar, the object of the game is to “score” with as many members of the opposite sex as possible. When the onscreen Lothario makes contact with the object of his (or her) affections, a heart appears on screen. A cocktail version of the game came in a heart-shaped cabinet.

name: Forza Horizon 5: Deluxe Edition
description: Your Ultimate Horizon Adventure awaits! Explore the vibrant and ever-evolving open world landscapes of Mexico with limitless, fun driving action in hundreds of the world’s greatest cars. The Deluxe Edition includes the full game and Car Pass.

name: Forza Horizon 5: Premium Edition
description: Your Ultimate Horizon Adventure awaits! Explore the vibrant and ever-evolving open world landscapes of Mexico with limitless, fun driving action in hundreds of the world’s greatest cars. The Premium Edition includes early access to the full game, allowing you to play four days early beginning November 5, 2021. Also included are the Welcome Pack, Car Pass, VIP Membership, and two game expansions when they become available.

name: Nascar 21: Ignition - Day 1 Edition
