description: Nascar 21: Ignition redefines the official video game of the world’s most popular stock car racing series. With incredible graphics and immersive gameplay, Nascar 21: Ignition brings a whole new level of authenticity and atmosphere to the Nascar Cup Series.

name: Football
description: Sin descripción

name: Crash
description: A variation on Gremlin's Head On by Exidy.

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione
description: Assetto Corsa Competizione, the official GT World Challenge videogame. Thanks to the extraordinary quality of simulation, you will experience the atmosphere of the GT3 championship. Compete against official drivers, teams, cars and official circuits reproduced to the highest quality ever seen.

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: Day One Edition
description:
Assetto Corsa Competizione, the official GT World Challenge videogame. Thanks to the extraordinary quality of simulation, you will experience the atmosphere of the GT3 championship. Compete against official drivers, teams, cars and official circuits reproduced to the highest quality ever seen.

The Day One Edition includes the 2020 GT World Challenge Pack DLC.

name: Horizon Forbidden West: Launch Edition
description:
Horizon Forbidden West continues Aloy’s story as she moves west to a far-future America to brave a majestic, but dangerous frontier where she’ll face awe-inspiring machines and mysterious new threats.

Horizon Forbidden West Launch Edition includes a voucher code to redeem all Horizon Forbidden West pre-order digital bonuses.

name: Crusader Kings III: Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Beyond a Steel Sky: Beyond a Steel Book Edition
description:
Beyond A Steel Sky: Beyond A SteelBook Edition Includes: Base Game, Limited Edition SteelBook featuring comic artwork by Dave Gibbons, Sticker Sheet, Digital Original Soundtrack

The World: An adventure set within a dynamic world, populated by willful characters and driven by motivations that the player can subvert; In combination with a unique hacking tool, multiple solutions to puzzles emerge from the player's choices

The Story: Unravel dark conspiracies and defeat a terrifying antagonist in this dramatic, humorous, cyberpunk thriller which explores contemporary themes, such as: social control, AI, and total surveillance

The Puzzles: Intelligent puzzles are interwoven with an intriguing dramatic narrative to deliver a compelling gameplay experience.

The Look: A beautifully detailed, comic-book styled world from the mind of legendary comic artist Dave Gibbons (Watchmen)

name: Halo Infinite: Steelbook Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The King of Fighters XV: Day One Edition
description:
The King of Fighters XV, is the fifteenth installment of The King of Fighters series. Transcend beyond your limits with KOF XV! Classic popular characters, heroes and villains revived from the dead, new challengers, and more!

The Day One Edition includes:
- Base game
- DLC Costume: Terry "Garou: Mark of the Wolves

name: Okinawa Rush: Limited Edition
description:
Okinawa Rush is a martial arts platforming game with RPG elements, many items to collect and unique FengShui system.

Okinawa Rush: Limited Edition contents:
- 1 FuturePak
- 1 Magnet coin FuturePak
- Limited Edition Slip Cover
- Standard Sealed game
- Individually Numbered
- Only 2000pcs Produced

name: Mary Skelter Finale: Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Koh Lanta: Les Aventuriers
description:
Will you be the last adventurer on the island? 14 adventurers left to their own devices, on an island far from any civilization ... A game of survival and strategy in an idyllic atmosphere ... A television show that brings together several million viewers each season ... Koh-Lanta is a game that will involve dexterity , diplomacy and the nerves of the player to the test: life on an island is not a part of pleasure, and each day will bring its share of surprises ... Manage your daily life well, the events in team or solo, but especially your relationships with other islanders to continue the adventure to the end and be the last adventurer on the island! But beware: if you falter or get eliminated by your peers… the game is over!

Koh Lanta: Les Aventuriers is a game based on the French adaptation of the tv show Survivor, exclusive to France.

name: Fallout 76 + Wastelanders
description: Sin descripción

name: Cupid Parasite: Day One Edition
description:
Welcome to Cupid Corporation! - Located in the glitzy and trendsetting metropolis of Los York, Cupid Corporation is a daring marriage agency known for its style and success rate.

Our heroine, Lynette Mirror, is Cupid Corporation's top bridal advisor, whose job is to consult in-vogue singles to make their wildest romantic dreams come true! BUT she has one huge secret up her sleeve-she is none other than Celestia's Goddess of Love, Cupid!

Sent to the Human Realm on her heavenly mission of "matchmaking", Lynette meets her biggest challenge yet: the infamous Parasite 5. In order to help these five hopeless men find true love, Lynette and her team concoct the perfect matchmaking plan... REALITY TV.

Will Lynette be able to live up to her name as top bridal advisor and Cupid, or will her dreams get cancelled?

Day 1 Edition

Nintendo Switch Game (with reversible cover sleeve)
6 Trading Cards
Sticker Sheet
Double-Sided A2 Poster
Collector's Box

name: Yonder: The Cloud Catcher Chronicles - Enhanced Edition
description: Yonder: The Cloud Catcher Chronicles – Enhanced Edition features DualSense wireless controller haptic feedback and speaker support, 4K resolution and 60 frames per second gameplay, and additional player character accessories.

name: Sakura no Kumo: Scarlet no Koi - Complete Limited Edition
description:
Box contents:
- Game: Sakura no Kumo * Scarlet no Koi
- B2 tapestry
- Consumer version "Sakura no Kumo ＊ Scarlet no Koi" Opening Song "Yumemi Hanabira"
- Telegram version Memo Book

name: Mystic Rhythms
description: In this game, you take the role of a normal and successful guy married to a gorgeous Russian woman. You met her online and following a quick long distance courtship, you paid for her trip out of Russia and the fancy engagement ceremony that followed. Since then life has been good and you've been the envy of many.

name: PokéSnake
description: Clone of Nokia Snake, no sound but the machine rumble when you eat fruit.

name: Initial D Arcade Stage 5
description:
Released on February 25, 2009 in Japan, Initial D Arcade Stage 5 was the second game in the series released on the Sega Lindbergh hardware. A few notable differences include massive physics changes. Compared to Arcade Stage 4/Extreme Stage, which used "drifting" physics, Arcade Stage 5 featured more realistic driving physics, which included tire and brake wear down. Although the tire and brake wear are not displayed anywhere in the game, experienced players can notice the difference in the change in physics as they progress in races.

New characters that appeared for the first time in the game are Kobayakawa, Satoshi Omiya, Imposter Project D, Kai Kogashiwa (R.T. Katagiri S.V.), and Hideo Minagawa. New courses such as Happogahara, which used from Arcade Stage Ver.1 to Arcade Stage Ver.3/Street Stage (only daytime used is night) and only Extreme Stage appeared with full daytimes between day and night and Nagao, R.T. Katagiri S.V.'s home course.

name: The Repairing Mantis
description: The Repairing Mantis is a narrative horror game that lets you experience the disturbing, violent nightmare of a mantis on a mission to repair a bridge made of flying squirrel flesh.

name: Harvest Moon: Light of Hope - Special Edition: Doc's & Melanie's Special Episodes
description: Help out Melanie and Doc in two side stories that will unlock new shops! Melanie is in a designing slump, and needs your help for inspiration! Meanwhile, Doc is having trouble in the romance department! Can you help him out?

name: Skotos
description: Grab your Lantern and plunge into the darkness of Skotos, a terrifying first-person platforming game that will make you brave the darkness to survive.

name: Your Show Has Been Cancelled
description: Your favorite show has been cancelled due to unbelievable circumstances. Take down foes who dare to get in your way in randomly-generated dungeon levels as you adventure to figure out what really happened and bring back your show!

name: Monica's Revenge Tragedy
description: Boyish heroine Monica sets out to take revenge. The abuse is frantic in each and the animation is a must-see.

name: Sweet Match 3
description: Sweet Match 3 is a simple match 3 game. Drag and drop the candy and get a high score. Made in Construct 3. Enjoy your game!The game has nice graphics and music.Collect as many Jelly as you can and get the most points.Forward!

name: Drag Engineer
description: If you are interested in programming, you will like the game. You will play an engineer, use the mouse to drag various instructions to write programs, and let them run normally to meet the requirements of the boss. Some levels test your logic ability very much. Please think carefully before you act.

name: Domynyo
description: Post-apocalyptic and Abandonment are the protagonists of the 1st Season. Dark locations and abandoned places in a 4k world. The day-night cycle and climate conditions will influence the game to the point that you could find yourself in the dark seeking for a torch and praying for the storm to end.

name: Wager
description: Wager is roguelike about winning a game of dice against a hacker goose.

name: The Island of Dr. Yepstein
description: The Island of Dr. Yepstein - an uncompromising first-person action shooter that takes place on a paradise tropical island. The player in the role of a super-cool commando will have to meet face to face with dangerous enemies and solve all the secrets of the mysterious island.

name: Skattered Dream
description: A Difficult Platformer, Skattered Dream is a tribute to the classic games of the 80's. It may look dated but this little game that still could can pack a serious punch. Its not easy to survive in this world but boy is it fun!

name: Burn Me Alive 2
description: The genre of our game is a mixture of psychological horror and drama with elements of action, survival melee, and shooting.

name: 69 Erika Love
description: 69 Erika Love - Play an exciting puzzle game with Erika. Everyone's beloved Miss Erica stays after class especially for you. Collect all the pieces of the puzzle and open the reward. Relaxing music and meditative gameplay will allow to have a good rest after work .

name: Haunted Hotel: The Axiom Butcher - Collector's Edition
description: Eleven years after the Axiom Butcher's reign of terror in the hotel, the murders have resumed. It's up to you to uncover the mystery behind this madman and help the hotel guests.

name: Neon Arena
description: Neon Arena is a space arcade scoring arena game.

name: Love Colors: Pixel Adventurer
description: Pixel Adventurer includes 110+ new images in new categories and takes you on a world tour painting iconic scenes like the Eiffel Tower, Big Ben and Sydney Opera House as well as other majestic citiescapes and beautiful landscapes.

name: Love Colors: Happy Pixels
description: Happy Pixels features 130+ new images including yummy sweets, exciting sports and vehicles, farming, emotes as well as festive periods for Christmas and Halloween.

name: Love Colors: All in One
description: Love Colors - All in One Pack Includes DLC 1 - Happy Pixels features and DLC 2 - Pixel Adventurer.

name: Project: Cow
description: A strategy game focused on stealth mode, your objective is to escape from the Spaceship hiding in hiding places without the Aliens noticing your movement. Be patient with the cow grandma, the poor thing is old and doesn't move so quickly.

name: Synthwaifu: Neon Space Fighter
description: Synthwaifu: Neon Space Fighter is inspired by the arcade games of the 80s. Destroy waves of enemy spaceships to score points and unlock all the drawings.

name: Vivid Surf
description: Vivid Surf is a new take on the glitch made mechanic called 'surf'. Glide frictionlessly through the surreal environments in a single-player focused campaign. Get rewarded as you improve your skill with a comprehensive timer. Then take the skills you learned to the multiplayer Remball arena.

name: Memories
description: Memories is a horror game where you explore a murder victims house and try to investigate the case while navigating around a house, avoiding the evil spirits that lurk within. Surviving the investigation will be a true test of your fears, explore the house if you dare. Entering the house you're tasked with finding out what happened to Malina Edward and why and how she was murdered. Once you find yourself in the house, you can explore the entire house and gather clues on what possibly happened to Malina, the more you piece together about her death you discover more and more that this house isn't a normal house. You find that the house is haunted with different demons trying to murder you after Malina.

name: Infinite Cube Defense
description: If you want to spend a little time playing games and keep moving and catching monsters, start right now.

name: Loop Timer
description: A timer cycle permanently

name: Billiards Legend: Black 8 Miracle
description: This is the most challenging billiards game. Exquisite graphics quality, Sidespin, masse, jump ball! Enjoy the billiard ball collision!

name: GHD
description: GHD: It is a multiplayer shooter. Where it puts the players in the face of some of them. And the winning team gets points and coins. There are five game modes. There are many weapons to pick up. This game is different from all games where the battle environment gives a very beautiful impression

name: Koala Quest: Parenthood Prevention
description:
Koala recently got knocked up, but she's not at all enthused about giving birth and raising a kid. It's up to her and her neighbors to find the herbs necessary to end pregnancy.

Action! Diplomacy! Adventure! Elemento! This multi-genre game has it all! Or maybe just those four things.

name: Z: Escape - Aftermath
description: Test or prepare yourself against the main villains.

name: Arizona Sunshine: Dead Man
description: Welcome to the final days before the zombie apocalypse! Arizona Sunshine – Dead Man DLC drops you in an infested US missile base where you will lead a frantic attempt by US Army Special Forces to contain the expanding zombie outbreak in the American Southwest.

name: Two Worlds II: Shattered Embrace
description: Return to Antaloor for a brand new adventure in the Two Worlds saga! When the ancient Elves resurface on a remote island, an old secret leads to the rise of a new evil. Racing against time, you must travel to the depths of hell and back before secrets of the past destroy the future of the land!

name: Odysseus Kosmos and his Robot Quest: Episode 3
description: What do you do if you are the only one left aboard a spaceship? Your team has embarked on a mysterious expedition a few years ago, the ship’s machinery has started acting up and it seems there are ghosts wandering about. Luckily, the black hole above you doesn’t pose any problems…yet.

name: The Escapists: Santa's Sweatshop
description: After suffering Santa's cruel regime for 20 years, it's time you got back home to enjoy Christmas with your real family. Sick and tired of bad working conditions and rubbish pay, you decide to hit Santa where it hurts most and escape Santa's Sweatshop!

name: Terminus
description: Embark on a psychedelic 30 minute VR journey into a mysterious universe of alien architecture, populated by humanoid clones and cryptic symbols.

name: Rico: Breakout
description: A mass break-out at the San Amaro prison has brought to the streets a dangerous and unpredictable set of enemies. With a city-wide ordinance in place, the RICO team is drafted in to help.

name: Curiosity
description: "Curiosity killed the cat, but after satisfying it she was resurrected." This game is a visual novel. Features of the game - puzzles and several endings, depending on your choice.

name: Dialogue Box: The Road Less Traveled
description: A rage-inducing skill based game with a dynamic story that unfolds using the player choices

name: VoidExpanse: Pariahs' Bane
description: In this expansion you will face a new threat to the sector - a group of renegades know as Pariahs, led by the infamous Shank Twice. Pariahs are in the habit of asking favors no one can't refuse, and you might become one of those unfortunates. Dive into a brand-new storyline involving pirates, sabotage and gang wars.

name: Blue Snake Adventures: Master Level
description: Blue Snake Adventures: Master level is a dlc for blue snake adventures base game.

name: Smugglers V: The Smugglers Guild
description: With this downloadable content (DLC) you will receive three background stories (mini-quests) called "The Smugglers Guild", "Solomon´s Treasure" and "Thirst for Vengeance" for the game "Smugglers 5: Secession".

name: Thea: The Awakening - Return of the Giants
description: The Return of the Giants is a free DLC for Thea: The Awakening. Just as you thought the Darkness was dealt with, a new threat rises and shakes the ground you've built on! Discover 70 new quests, new creatures and buildings and create your very own adventures in Thea!

name: Black Knight: Milena
description: A gifted rookie Black Knight Milena is making her great debut!! …Or at least that was her goal before she messed up on her mission because of her inexperience. And so began her training to become a better Black Knight with Master Celia! If only her behavior could also be improved…

name: Zombie Exodus: Safe Haven - Part Two
description: Zombie Exodus: Safe Haven: Part Two continues your story as you escape Nightfall with your new group of survivors in search of a safe haven. Continue your story from part one, or skip right to the new chapters with a new character!

name: DGU: Death God University - Sinister Semester
description: Introducing a spooky new level ‘Asylum & Rehab’ with two new interesting targets to plot and set a trap for. Put your insanity on display in this macabre setting!

name: Refraction
description: Jackie Shields wakes up to find everything in her world a little different than she remembers it. Trapped between her own dimension and a parallel one, she soon realizes that nothing can remain unchanged in her life. Especially not herself...because the other dimension has a Jackie of its own!

name: Odysseus Kosmos and his Robot Quest: Episode 2
description: What do you do if you are the only one left aboard a spaceship? Your team has embarked on a mysterious expedition a few years ago, the ship’s machinery has started acting up and it seems there are ghosts wandering about. Luckily, the black hole above you doesn’t pose any problems…yet.

name: Classic Tanks 2020
description: Classic Tanks - a pleasant game in the classic style of retro tanks in a new comprehension. Capture bases, complete levels and destroy enemies. The game has more than 20 missions, several types of enemies and bonuses.

name: Unity of Command: Red Turn
description: Dying days of the Stalingrad Campaign saw the Wehrmacht reeling under heavy blows.

name: Atelier Lydie & Suelle: The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings - Great Adventures in New Worlds Vol. 2
description: This bundle will add two new areas to the game: a BLUE REFLECTION tribute area "Blue Sentiment Land" and the "Ventus Mines" area.

name: Earth Attack
description: Tragedy strikes as aliens attack Earth. You're left alone to pilot the last remaining spacecraft on its way back to Earth from Mars Colony. Avoid missiles, asteroids, enemy ships, and more as you accumulate high-scores in Earth Attack!

name: The Line: The Other Path
description: The other path is an alternative way to stand in the Line. In this DLC you can ignore cops, knocking at your door and escape in old living district.

name: Santa Claus in Trouble HD
description: Help Santa to collect lost christmas presents in this wonderful 3D Jump'n'Run experience. An exciting arcade adventure is just waiting for the kids in your life and especially the kid in you!

name: Escape the Ayuwoki: The Summoning
description: Re-experience the tragic, final moments that occurred in the burning mansion as you try to escape far away from it. You play as Alexa, another survivor from the mansion who is trying to get away from the horrors of this haunting place.

name: Victor Vran: Cauldron of Chaos Dungeon
description: The Cauldron of Chaos is an ever-changing dungeon that offers randomized daily challenges for veteran demon hunters. This new content is available only for characters of level 26 and above.

name: Shan Gui II: Sweet Osmanthus II - Episode 2
description: He Jia and Han Hui, Li Qiucheng and He Dai, He Ren and Eryue Lan... Different people encountered with their thoughts conveyed. In this autumn day, shall they lost again in sweet osmanthus's fragrance?

name: Super Indie Square: Fight Against Time
description: In Super Indie Square - Fight Against Time your goal is collect all the coins before time runs out, and any simple mistake is fatal.

name: Shadowrun Chronicles: Boston Lockdown - Infected!
description: With Boston saved, but still under Lockdown, what do you do if you have become one of the infected yourself? As you loose control over your body and mind, you will have to find a cure or die trying!

name: Monitor: The Game - Alix: A Monitor Story
description: Alix: A MONITOR Story is a narrative-based point and click game that revolves around the player character of Nathan Ryker; a budding private investigator and detective who is trying to make an honest living but has had to set up in the inner-city areas of New York. 120 choices to make and 7 endings...

name: PBA: Basketball Slam - Arcade Edition
description: PBA Basketball Slam: Arcade Edition! This zany and quirky arcade-style basketball features epic moves, high-flying dunks, and witty commentary that will keep you at the end of your seats. It’s basketball stripped down to its most fun and basic components which makes it easy to pick-up and enjoy.

name: Zombie Hunter
description: Take your guns and start killing zombies in the best FPS Shooting game

name: The Plague: Kingdom Wars - Dead Rising
description: The Dead Rising DLC adds an optional Undead mode to The Plague: Kingdom Wars campaign. The millions infected with the Black Death will soon turn into an even deadlier plague, as hordes of undead aimlessly roaming Europe, destroying everything in their path.

name: Einar: Loki's Traps
description: Einar is a Viking who, finding himself a god, had a surprise.

name: Impossible Mission Remastered
description: “Stay a while, stay FOREVER!” Race against the clock to gather the pieces of a secret password, platforming through 32 rooms and dodging 90 different deadly robot guards to stop the evil plans of the sinister Elvin Atombender in this all-time classic, now remastered for Steam.

name: fullybroKen
description: Play as single character in a 4x game. Survive. Thrive. Die. Unite the country of Mir. Kill, make hard choice, become anything you want in this unique post-apocalyptic game. Die. With ideas from 4X, Match-3 RPGs, Traditional RPGs and roguelikes, fullybroKEN offers an experience unlike anything else.

name: Rabi-Ribi: Cicini's Halloween!
description: Cicini wants to get everyone hyped for Halloween! Her plans include new mini side story, new areas, new enemies and a whole new boss fight with new music!

name: United Assault: Normandy '44
description: An open world rogue lite FPS set in 1944's depiction of Normandy. Unlock authentic weapons and take part in the unique passive multiplayer.

name: Fire Trump: Air Combat VR
description: President Thump of Country A always provokes disputes between countries in the world, making people of all countries uneasy. In order to defend the peace of the world, let us fly fighter jets to war against this selfish politician!

name: In Fear I Trust: Episode 3 - Iron and Rust
description: “In Fear I Trust” 3rd Episode tells us about the strange events at the local factory. They took place when the player used to work there. The mysterious deaths, the mysterious inspectors. Advancing the episode, the player tries to find out what is really going on and how this is related to VERSA company. Why are people dying on a scheduled basis?

name: Age of Reforging: Blackthorn
description: Customize an unique character with countless conbinations of weapon skills and magic spells. Gather your party and experience a deep immersive adventure in this medieval - fantasy world.

name: Shadowrun Chronicles: Infected - Missions
description: Random Mission Pack: Boston never sleeps and there are always Nuyen and Karma to be earned for an industrious Shadowrunner. From collecting nanite samples to freeing hostages and defusing bombs, a wealth of repeatable randomized set-ups mission will keep you on your toes and allow you to improve your character and gear.

name: Selenon Rising: Episode 2
description: Episode 2 continues the story of Selenon Rising.

name: Selenon Rising: Episode 3
description: Episode 3 continues the story of Selenon Rising.

name: Super Lucky's Tale: Gilly Island
description: Welcome back to adventure! "Super Lucky's Tale", returns with an all new chapter. Join Lucky as he journeys to the tropical resort of "Gilly Island" where Lady Meowmalade has hijacked the festivities and is throwing the greatest (worst) party ever.

name: Air Attack
description: Take a 5 minute break to de-stress with this high-intensity, ultra simple, retro arcade shooter! Take down airplanes. Dig tunnels. Hide and seek shelter. Try and beat the highscore. That's all. Afterwards, you will go back to your life with renewed energy of body and mind.

name: Hentaicraft
description: Hentaicraft is a sandbox with an endless open world that consists of cubes. Your possibilities here are limited only by your imagination. Get resources, build, travel and enjoy a cute character!

name: Automobilista: Legendary Tracks Part 3 - Hockenheim
description: Part 3 of Legendary Tracks has arrived - the classic Hockenheimring from Germany, featuring 4 distinct versions from 4 different decades - 1977, 1988, 2001 plus the modern GP versions and several alternative layouts.

name: PewPew!
description: PewPew! - move, shoot and upgrade!

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3: V Generation - Giant Island
description: The Giant's Island DLC brings exactly that - an island inhabited by stronger enemies! A perfect place to relax in the sun and grind!

name: Hacker Evolution Duality: Inception Part 1
description: INCEPTION Part 1 is going back to the roots of the Hacker Evolution games. We have taken the levels from the original Hacker Evolution game and remastered them for the new Hacker Evolution Duality engine. Experience an entirely new game through this DLC as you hack your way through 10 levels.

name: The Cure
description: An open world strategy game set in a dark medieval fantasy environment. You can buy and place buildings and you must manage your resources to upgrade them. Every night, you are attacked by creatures.

name: Archangel: Hellfire - Fully Loaded
description: Fight for reign over post-apocalyptic lands: Go solo and explore life before all-out war ignited, or battle waves of enemy mechs in Mech Assault Coop Mode (1-4p)—Enlist in The Great Mech Wars today!

name: Bad Vibes
description: BAD VIBES is a weird, wild homage to the golden era of first-person shooters. Trapped in an alien maze, you're forced to survive as long as you can. Run around collecting keys and vaporizing all the baddies that get in your way. The longer you stay alive, the more bad vibes you crush, the higher your score when you win. BAD VIBES is pure shooter madness, the way it was intended to be.

name: Caapora Adventure: Ojibe's Revenge
description: Explore a beautiful world inspired by Amazon rainforest with many secrets, puzzles and creatures from myths and legends from Brazilian Folklore

name: Ignis Universia: Awakening of the Erudite Empress
description: Ignis Universia is a cute and funny JRPG and Visual Novel mix with a seasoning of tongue-in-cheek story that references to old genre classics. May contain references to stereotypes and clichés (RPG, fantasy, music, anime and small doses of other nerdy interests).

name: eSports Manager
description: eSports Manager is an eSports organization manager simulator. Sign players and staff, manage squad, training and tactics to achieve the title of the best team in the world!

name: Glory
description: Glory is an RTS/Simulation game set in the Medieval period. Command your army in combat and battles to defeat your enemy and achieve victory. For Glory!

name: Affairs of the Court: Choice of Romance - A Life Mage Child
description: If you start a new game beginning in Episode 3: 'Til Death Do Us Part, this option unlocks the ability to make your son Antonio a Life Mage, putting him in line to inherit the throne.

name: Car Trader Simulator: Welcome to the Business
description: Welcome to the prologue to Car Trader Simulator. Here you will learn all the most important in mechanics and economics in the game and you will play your first mission.

name: Neighbor: Lingering Memories Side-Story
description: Andou, a writer for occult-focused magazine publisher Misty Publishing, ends up spending the night at a shady property on order from his boss, Uchiyama. Maebara Heights, room 103. Investigating the rumors of disappearances linked to the room, Andou finds himself swalled into a dark mystery.

name: Alice VR: Roboto Factory
description: Get inside the famous Roboto Factory, where all the bots you've met on Speculo were created. Discover its workings and see your old mechanical companions in a new light.

name: The Remainder: Act 2
description: The Remainder is a dark fantasy mystery where you will try to save The High Magus Vyn from certain death. Will you find your way alone or will you reignite a lost love? Is it worth the sacrifice? Do you deserve to be saved?

name: Crude
description: Kosmos is an MMA fighter who suddenly finds himself teleported into a dark fantasy world and searches for a way to return home. CRUDE is a Soul-like, fantasy platformer with metroidvania elements & an open world map.

name: Walkerman: Act 2 - Herdchaser-girl
description: The second installment of Walkerman, a Visual Novel by ScalemaiL.

name: Fears to Fathom: Home Alone
description: In the first episode of Fears to Fathom you play as Miles, a 14 years old kid who is home alone while his parents are out of town for work. He soon finds himself in trouble as the story unfolds, would he make it through the night?

name: Seek Girl VII
description: This is a casual Sokoban game. The player needs to use the keyboard to control the male character through the level to find the female character.

name: Seek Girl V
description: This is a Sokoban casual game. Players need to fill the holes in the ground with cubes to rescue the trapped girl.

name: Seek Girl Ⅵ
description: This is a casual Sokoban game. Players need to use the keyboard to control the male character to move to the female character to complete the task and move to the next level.

name: Atelier Lydie & Suelle: The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings - Great Adventures in New Worlds Vol. 1
description: This bundle will add two new areas to the game: a Nights of Azure 2 tribute area "Nightless Ruined City" and the "Lotus Blossom Pond" area. *This content unlocks after the final chapter of the game. *This content is also included into "Atelier Lydie & Suelle Season Pass."

name: Battlestage
description: - Co-op Twin Stick Shooter

name: Gravitaze: One
description: Gravitaze is a minimalist puzzle whose objective is to make the circle reach the center of the labyrinth, changing the gravity of the circle and rotating the labyrinth.

name: The Game of Life 2: Haunted Hills world
description: Explore new worlds in THE GAME OF LIFE 2. Enter a realm where creepy creatures rule! Join your friends and family for a spooky adventure, wherever you are!

name: Indian Army: Mission Pok
description: This is Third person shooter Game based on indian army .

name: Conjuntalia: Overcome the Death of a Loved One
description: You are in the highest part of an unknown tower, beyond the sky, accompanied by Michi... What could happen?...

name: Girl.exe
description: You and your friends go to another world because you wanted to find a girlfriend. And you found one.... There is one crazy girl in this world. Will you be able to get out of this world or will you stay with her forever?

name: Space Survival
description: Space Survival is a 3D PC shoote'm up game with large maps and various levels to complete.

name: Jewels of the Mysterious Woodland: Cat and Children Jewel Match
description: Cat and Children Jewel Match - The new match 3 game is here, with brilliant jewels in over 600 dazzling puzzles! A magical journey filled with waves of excitement and brilliant visuals! Swap jewels to clear the way, and match pieces to crush each challenge that lies ahead.

name: Elmo's Kangaroo of the damned: Punishment Edition
description: Your name is Elmo. You have a kangaroo. Your kangaroo is missing. GET... IT... BACK!

name: Hard Reset: Extended Edition - Exile
description: In the only remaining human city of Bezoar, Major Fletcher, an Army Combat Veteran and soldier of the CLN, is dragged into a conflict between two of mankind's greatest enemies. He is to discover that nothing is what it seems to be.Hard Reset is an action-packed, single-player shooter for the PC.

name: Dynasty Feud: The Night Party
description: The Night Party They met at a midnight rave party, and they soon found out they were all outcasts misunderstood by society. Yeah, like teenagers. Only they are much older. Soon they decided to band together and support each other during the long nights. And dance till dawn.

name: Rainbows, Toilets & Unicorns: Influencerama
description: Defeat the most ruthless influencers in the Influencerama DLC

name: Shine's Adventures 0: Zombies Reload
description: Shine woke up in an unfamiliar place, and she found many horrible zombies around. In order to survive, Shine needs to explore this unfamiliar place. She needs to collect weapons, medicines, items and so on.Everything is to survive.

name: Opening Night at the Großen Schauspielhaus: Berlin 1927
description: Visit Berlin 1927 and explore the VR-reconstruction of the famous theatre. Three storytellers, Walter, Fritzi and Otto, invite you to share their anticipation of the opening night – behind the scenes and on stage. Our digital theatre opens new perspectives; cultural heritage comes alive virtually.

name: Redux
description: A puzzle game about destroying your past self.

name: Gods of Havoc: Into the Void - Rise of the AI
description: Re-enter a universe where other gods are the least of your worries. A deadly robot army now seeks to obliterate all life, and all religion!

name: Deception
description: Deception is a 3D puzzle adventure set in an underground mysterious place. No one knows how to enter, no one knows how to escape.

name: Devil Catcher
description: Devil Catcher is a third-person Platformer with some Light Combat elements.

name: Harvest Moon: Light of Hope - Special Edition: New Marriageable Characters Pack
description: Expand your experience with new and exciting content! Two new eligable residents have moved into Beacon Town! Shirlock, a fledgling journalist and self-proclaimed detective who is studying under the tutelage of Naomi, and Michelle, Doc's research partner.

name: Apocrypha
description: Apocrypha is a multiplayer magical action game where you participate in tactical team-based fights. Build your unique mage, develop your own playstyle using wide variety of spells and abilities, craft useful items and gain rewards!

name: Victory At Sea Ironclad
description: Victory at Sea Ironclad is the exciting game of naval RTS combat set during the American Civil War. Bringing an epic approach to real time strategy war gaming, search and destroy enemy fleets across an open world sandbox in a desperate attempt to change the course of history.

name: Flingleberries!
description: FLING, PULL, KICK! Do whatever it takes to win! Play across 5 UNIQUE MAPS and 3 GAME MODES! Collect a variety of pickups from SWORDS to RAYGUNS! Online Multiplayer via REMOTE PLAY TOGETHER![/list]

name: Haunted House: The Murder
description: Haunted House: The Murder is an interactive Horror Game. You decide where to go.

name: Couch Combat
description: Couch Combat is a fun, frantic, Splitscreen FPS made specifically with PC players in mind! Play with up to 4 players locally in short, fast-paced rounds.

name: Knight of Exile
description: Prepare your weapons and head to battle, Knight of Exile is a 2D action platformer with hack-n-slash combat where you will embark on a journey of revenge and redemption to liberate the kingdom of Olmur.

name: 7 Summer Days: Youth sky
description: A visual novel that takes place in the same universe as "7 summer days".

name: Max Raider
description: Max Raider is a top-down 3D action shooter where you fight waves of enemies on procedurally generated arenas. Rest and prepare for the next series of waves by buying a variety of weapons and items from your allies. Protect the Bunker, your only hope for a home.

name: System Crash: Underworld
description: Underworld introduces an exciting new story campaign and a powerful new card set focused on turning your Archive (discard pile) into a potent resource.

name: Action Commando
description: As a time travelling Spartan Soldier, you must stop the Cult of the Fallen Gods that are turning people into burger meat. Grab your sword and assault cannon and deal death to these disfigured freaks in the name of humanity.

name: Affairs of the Court: Choice of Romance - Death to the Princess
description: If you start a new game beginning in Episode 3: 'Till Death Do Us Part, this option unlocks the ability to kill the Princess Juanita—and get away with it.

name: World Warfare & Economic
description: Control Any Country and Lead Her to Greatness. Modify Laws, Control The Economy, Build Facilities, Produce and Trade Resources, Make Diplomatic Relations With Other Countries, Build Military Bases, Fight Wars, Conquer Regions and Lead Your Population.

name: Organ Trail: Final Cut Expansion
description: The Final Cut Expansion adds double the content to Organ Trail.New features include:Choose-your-route on the road with twice as many cities5 unlockable cars 10 unlockable characters3 new boss fights3 new zombie typesRadiation mechanic gives you a new way to die Hit and Run driving jobGraveyard retrieval mission FishingMore and new bandit...

name: Age of Fear: The Undead King Gold - The Quest for Immortality
description: Talnes, an aspiring alchemist, always wanted to be a hero. With an ancient tome stolen from his master, he embarks on a journey to find the secret of eternal youth. What kind of challenges await our heroes? Will Talnes reach his goal or be consumed by ancient beasts?

name: Mythos Ever After: A Cthulhu Dating Sim
description: Just your average cosmic horror dating sim.

name: Shadow Step
description: Blaze your own trail through uncharted and mysterious territory!

name: Flirtatious
description: It's puzzle time! Connect all the neon pipes together to solve the puzzle and reveal high quality, realistic, naughty & sexy girls!

name: Onnanoko Keeper
description: 'I've seen it somewhere, but I can't remember what it was... No, no more. Let's blaze a new trail.'

name: qop: DLC
description: In this DLC you get 12 new levels for qop.

name: Back of Space
description: A Solar Flare is coming. Deploy drones to backup the internet. Download data, sell data, buy more drones, back up the rest of the internet.

name: Moai 7: Mystery Coast
description: Hika-Ri is strong and brave and Kao-Ri is skilled in magic, but neither of them were prepared for what happened the day bandits landed on their uncharted shores. Guide Hika-Ri as he embarks on an epic adventure to save his sister from an unknown fate!

name: SpaceCrash
description: You crashed on an empty planet. Or is it...? Do you wait for rescue or do you take action and try to repair your rocket ? Explore random generated planets in SpaceCrash and enjoy the time spent!

name: Food War TD
description: A Tower Defense-Storytelling game about fighting against healthy foods!

name: Minesweeper: Collector
description: Tired of boring common square levels? Finally there is a brand new minesweeper with different game modes! Each level is a part of collection. Complete collections to obtain keys and gain access for more episodes. Achieve higher levels to unlock new items, chests, pets and much more!

name: Jubeez
description: Jubeez is an innovative and unique take on the match-3 genre. Try to form groups of Jubeez while moving around the board, but be careful not to corner yourself! The faster you play the more score you earn. Can you become the best Jubeez player in the world and rank at the top of the leaderboards?

name: Medieval Archery Simulator
description: Prove your skills in Medieval Archery Simulator! Sign up for different tournaments, showcase your marksmanship, and challenge the greatest archers the world has ever seen! Train, modify your arrows, upgrade your bow, and compete in a variety of exciting and unusual challenges.

name: Anderson
description: Anderson is a story-driven VR game inspired by classic point & click adventures. Experience a world of science and mystery, with the assistance of a peculiar simulated personality.

name: Tiny T
description: Unleash a furry of magic, bullets, blades , explosives and natural disasters on Tiny T!

name: Dragon Fang Z: The Rose & Dungeon of Time - Extra Dungeon: Friendship's Labyrinth
description: Now, our friendship is being tested! Let's go on the adventure with friends!

name: Hidden Memory: Neko's Life
description: Follow a cute stray kitten journey until he finds a home and use the opportunity to disconnect from the world with this beautiful and relaxing minimalist puzzle!

name: Angry Rock
description: Ever felt like tossing a rock at high speeds? Then you're in luck with Angry Rock! Throw rocks to achieve high scores as you beat the various levels included in Angry Rock. It's sure to be a rockin' good time!

name: Burn
description: Burn is a single-player interactive story told over 16 endings. It follows the biggest pop star in the world at the turning point of her career. Will she change pop music? Start a cult? You decide... You will BURN.

name: Leap of Love: Safe Edition
description: Leap of Love is a fantasy game where you play as Kaheroux a frog turned prince by a shady wizard. The catch of that spell is that he needs to find and marry a princess within a month or go back to being a frog.

name: Memory Lane
description: A game that you'll never forget! Memory Lane is a turned based RPG about taking names. Literally.

name: Battlescar: Punk Was Invented By Girls
description: Are you punk enough? Battlescar is a coming of age immersive film narrated by Rosario Dawson that takes place in a 1970's New York City. Join Lupe and Debbie, two runaways who's adventures in starting a punk rock band take them to places they never expected.

name: Battle Bears 1: Zombies
description: The very first Battle Bears game ever now on PC! Relive the Huggables, Campy Weapons, Crazy Bosses and Funny Cutscenes. Your childhood nostalgia is back in full force!

name: Infinium Strike: Broken Overlord
description: New ships with special abilities await your command in a new mini-campaign. Get back into the Wrog war to save humankind and also free the space creatures known as the Bubba. Extend the challenging journey of the Freedom Strike carrier with the Broken Overlord!

name: The Detail: Episode 2 - From the Ashes
description: From the Ashes is the second episode of The Detail, a neo-noir crime adventure from Rival Games. It continues the story of detective Reggie Moore, informant Joe Miller and officer Katelyn Hayes as they seek to find out what is truly happening to their city.

name: Mini War: Three Kingdoms
description: Mini War: Three Kingdoms is a minimalist tactical game set in ancient China. You will challenge more than 160 levels with at least 16 different kinds of heroes, to fight various tactical formations alone. One person, defeat the entire ancient army.

name: DGU: Death God University - Midterm Mania
description: Introducing a brand new level with top secret military missions, the Army Barracks. You have two targets to deal with while every mistake of yours could prove to be your undoing.

name: Cavern Commandos
description: Inspired by classic platformers like Rick Dangerous, Cavern Commandos offers a challenging gaming experience with numerous weapons, hundreds of foes, and dozens of labyrinthine caverns.

name: Knights of Pen and Paper: Haunted Fall
description: Knights of Pen & Paper: Haunted Fall expands on the unmistakable charm and wit of the original game with more enemies, more epic quest and more locations in a spine tingling Halloween setting.Navigate an engrossing new quest line where you square off against unruly Jack o Lanterns, wobbly undead and a mish mash of bewildered monsters.

name: Re:Award
description: Corridor walking simulator. You can walk in the corridor. Rin and Scarlett came to Rin's grandfather's house in the country.

name: Devil Slayer
description: R18 Fantasy RPG

name: House Flipper: Pets
description: It's finally time for finding your perfect renovation partner! Max, Phil, Bella? It's up to you to decide what's the name of your adopted companion. Take in an adorable pet and let him help you on your flipping journey in the friendly area of Cozy Village!

name: Potion Explosion: The Fifth Ingredient
description: It’s never too late to add to your magical education: The Fifth Ingredient expansion for Potion Explosion gives you a chance to go back to class and start learning some new tricks!

name: Bomber
description: Bomber - a funny time killer game with 20 levels

name: Nudist Beach Survival Simulator 2
description: Sunshine, cloudless sky, beautiful weather, nothing can spoil your day. But what is it? Why doesn't this gentleman have panties? Why does the old lady walk naked? Oh, no, it looks like you've come to the wrong beach...

name: Minigun vs. Swarms of the Zombie Apocalypse Simulator
description: 10k+ zombies on the same screen, faced with the scene of the doomsday, the raging tide of corpses, your Minigun is thirsty, yes! Hold on for 5 minutes if you think you are tough!

name: Case Kovacs: Agent 228
description: Case Kovacs: Agent 228 is a very short and intriguing mini game telling the story of Elizabeth Kovacs, the missing woman from the game NoseBound.

name: Kreepy Krawlers
description: Sin descripción

name: Mind Space
description: FPS with rouge like rpg elements. Made by one solo indie game developer.

name: Oath of Miko
description: The Oath of Miko is a round based game of light war chess based on the combination of war chess and strategic management. Based on the battle playing method of war chess, she supplemented it with strategic management orientation - rather than RPG orientation, in order to bring different experiences to war chess lovers and simulation management lovers.

name: The Pioneers: Surviving Desolation
description: The Pioneers: surviving desolation is a survival/simulation game for PC. You play as a crew of specialists isolated in a space station and trying to survive the climatic and geological threats of Io, the first moon of Jupiter. Customize your space station, manage your vital resources, explore the surrounding area to strategize and complete your mission.

name: The Hunt
description: The name says it all - in The Hunt, you get, well, hunted by hunters who will do everything they can to hunt you down. In order to survive, you must explore, scavenge, craft, and fight in order to survive. And if you survive and scavenge for long enough, there might just be a way to escape.

name: Tile Connect: Onet Match
description: Tile Connect: Onet Match is a super fun matching game with cool challenges and brain teasers! Enjoy hours of fun connecting lovely images. Test your skills by matching and linking the same kind of images and work your way up to victory!

name: SamuraiZero
description: Samurai Zero is a Platformer with various mechanics of passing, from runner to slasher, from training your attentiveness to concentrated reaction, all this is seasoned with the old-school effect of old TVs, creating a unique atmosphere and mood.

name: Secret Mission: Produce For President
description: Race for President is comming ! As an ordinary factory owner, what secret challenges are waiting for you?

name: Alice's Lullaby
description: Embark on a surreal, psychedelic adventure to travel back and forth through time and rescue young Alice, helping her escape the uncanny, macabre and treacherous world of Styx. Unravel the metaphysical mystery of the grandchild cult and find out why they call you the monster!

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition
description: Unmatched: Digital Edition is a turn-based game of epic battles between heroes from story and myth. And in battle, there are no limits!

name: Victor Banana
description: Sin descripción
